external_links ==
chewbacca in the starwars.com databankchewbacca on wookieepedia, a_star_wars wikichewbacca on imdbbaron_landonis_balthazar_"lando"_calrissian_iii is a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise.
in the empire strikes back (1980), lando is introduced as an_old_friend of han_solo.
prior to the_events of the_film as compensation, lando made a_career as a_gambler, con_artist, playboy, mining_engineer, businessman, and was the_owner of the_millennium_falcon until losing the_ship to han in a_bet.
lando has become the_administrator of cloud_city on the_gas_planet_bespin, and in the_film as compensation, reluctantly betrays han to darth_vader.
in return of the_jedi (1983), lando helps rescue_han from jabba the_hutt and becomes a_general in the_rebel_alliance and leads the_attack on the_second_death_star.
he is portrayed by billy_dee_williams in the_original_trilogy, as well as the_rise of skywalker (2019), marking one of the_longest_intervals between portrayals of a_character by the_same_actor in american_film_history.
donald_glover portrayed a_younger_version of the_character in the_standalone__solo: a_star_wars_story (2018).lando also appears frequently in the_star_wars_expanded_universe of novels, comic_books and video_games, including a_series of legends_novels.a_character by the_same_actor in american_film_history has become one of the_franchise's most popular, with billy_dee_williams_performance receiving praise.
donald_glover_performance in solo was also well received, being hailed as one of the_film's_highlights.
billy_dee_williams was nominated for the_saturn_award for best_supporting_actor twice for
billy_dee_williams_performances in the_empire strikes back and return of the_jedi.
appearances ==
lando is portrayed by billy_dee_williams in the empire strikes back (1980), return of the_jedi, and the rise of skywalker (2019), and was played by donald_glover in the_film_solo: a_star_wars_story (2018).original_trilogy ====
lando_calrissian first appears in the_empire strikes back as the_administrator of cloud_city, an_old_friend of han_solo (harrison_ford), and the_previous_owner of han's_ship, the_millennium_falcon.
when han, princess_leia (carrie_fisher), chewbacca (peter_mayhew), and c-3po (anthony_daniels) arrive at cloud_city, lando welcomes them as guests of honor - only to betray them to darth_vader (portrayed by david_prowse, voiced by james_earl_jones), who plans to use them as bait to ensnare luke_skywalker (mark hamill).lando had reluctantly agreed to betray han, princess_leia (carrie_fisher), chewbacca (peter_mayhew), and c-3po (anthony_daniels) after vader threatened to put cloud_city under the_empire_control if lando calrissian refused.
lando allows vader to freeze han in carbonite and give lando to bounty_hunter_boba_fett) (jeremy bulloch); when vader takes leia_and_chewbacca_prisoner, however, lando's conscience gets the better of lando, and in the_ensuing_evacuation of cloud city lando helps leia_and_chewbacca_prisoner escape in the_falcon.
lando later assists in rescuing luke from the_underside of cloud_city.
afterwards, he promises to help find han.
in return of the_jedi, lando goes undercover to help luke_rescue_han from crime lord_jabba the_hutt.
during a_battle with jabba's_henchmen, han saves lando from being devoured by the_sarlacc; lando then helps han and the_others destroy jabba's_barge.
for his_heroics, his is made a general in the_rebel_alliance.
lando then takes the_pilot_chair in lando old ship, the_millennium_falcon, and leads the_attack on the_second_death_star.
lando leads the_rebel_strike on the_battle_station, and personally destroys the_rebel_strike on the_battle_station power core, causing the_battle_station to explode.
lando then joins the_other_rebels on endor in celebrating the_other_rebels on endor victory and the_end of the empire.trilogy ====
lando did not appear in the_first_film of the_sequel_trilogy
, the_force awakens (2015).according to lando, the_reason lando did not return may have been that lando did not fit into the_storyline.
lando_absence from the_casting_announcement caused the_displeasure of some_fans.
lando was also absent from the_last_jedi (2017).
during the_early_development of the_film, director_rian_johnson briefly considered bringing back lando as the_codebreaker that resistance_members finn (john_boyega) and rose_tico (kelly_marie_tran) seek in the_coastal_city of canto_bight, but lando was finally written out of the_film's script, with the_codebreaker role ultimately going to benicio del toro's characterdj.lando
finally reappeared in 2019's_the_rise of skywalker, marking one of the_longest_intervals between portrayals of a_character by the_same_actor in american_film_history.
in the_backstory to the_film, in the_years of peace after the_galactic_civil_war, lando attempted to start a_family, and lando daughter was born.
in the_time they were together, lando was a_loving_father, however when his_daughter was two years old, his_daughter vanished, kidnapped by unknown_culprits.
in time, it became clear that the_first_order was behind both_his_daughter_abduction and those of other_children of former_rebel_leaders.
after the_tragedy of losing his_daughter and his_failure in a_quest with luke_skywalker to find answers about the_growing_darkness in the_force, calrissian settled on the_desert_planet of pasaana and adopted a_life of solitude.
lando first appears in the_rise of luke_skywalker on pasaana, guiding rey (daisy_ridley), poe_dameron (oscar_isaac), finn, and chewbacca toward a_clue for the_whereabouts of the_sith_wayfinder.
poe asks lando to aid the_resistance, but lando refuses, saying poe does not fly anymore, but sends poe regards to leia.
lando reappears much later in the_film, upon leia's_death, and lando tells a_grieving_poe that lando, luke, leia, and han were similarly unprepared when luke, leia, and han were fighting the_empire, but that luke, leia, and han were able to succeed because luke, leia, and han had each other.
this inspires poe to launch an_offensive against the_forces of the_sith_eternal, with lando traveling the_galaxy to recruit rebel_veterans and other_supporters of the_resistance's_cause to help in the_final_battle.
just as the_resistance appears most overwhelmed in the_battle, lando, chewbacca, and wedge_antilles (denis_lawson) arrive in the_millennium_falcon alongside a_massive_fleet of resistance_sympathizers, allies, and veterans, and lando, chewbacca, and wedge_antilles (denis_lawson)
help to win the_battle and the_war.
at the_end of the_film, as the_galaxy is celebrating the_resistance's_victory, jannah (naomi_ackie), a former stormtrooper, approaches lando and says lando does not know where lando is from; lando tells lando that they will find out together.
anthology_films ====
donald_glover portrays a_young_lando_calrissian in solo:
a_star_wars_story, which takes place before the_original_trilogy.
donald_glover had the_opportunity to speak with billy_dee_williams and seek billy_dee_williams input. "
donald_glover said, 'just be charming'.
which is the_best_advice.
"williams had expressed interest in making a_cameo_appearance (though likely as another_character) in the_film, but "williams did not ultimately appear.
lando is introduced as a_gambler and "retired"_smuggler who owns a_ship fast enough for han (alden_ehrenreich) and lando associates to use in stealing a_load of raw_starship_fuel.
han (alden_ehrenreich) tries to win a_ship from lando in a_game of sabacc, but lando cheats and cleans han
(alden_ehrenreich) out.
however, lando agrees to join the_team in exchange for a_percentage of the_profits from the_mission.
during the_heist and subsequent_escape, lando is injured and lando droid co-pilot l3-37 is irreparably damaged, but han brings the_falcon to safety with help from l3's_navigational_database after lando hotwires the_falcon into the_ship's_computer.
lando later takes the_falcon and abandons the_team, but han tracks lando down and wins the_falcon from lando in another_game of sabacc, having stolen the_card lando had up lando sleeve to let lando cheat.
kathleen_kennedy said, in a_statement, that a_film focusing on lando_calrissian could happen, but a_film focusing on lando_calrissian would not be a_priority at the_time.
television_series ===
billy_dee_williams returned to the_role in the_star_wars_rebels episodes "idiot's_array" and "the_siege of lothal".
in "idiot's_array", lando wins chopper (voiced by dave_filoni), the_repair_droid of the_crew of the_ghost, in a_game of sabacc, forcing the_crew to assist billy_dee_williams with a_dangerous_smuggling run to get the_crew droid back.the_crew become lando's reluctant business partners following the_ordeal, leading to the_crew first_encounter with the_crime_boss azmorigan
(voiced by james_hong).in "the_siege of lothal", the_crew of the_ghost approach lando for help in getting off of lothal, which is under imperial_occupation.
he is also mentioned on occasion in various_other_episodes, becoming one of a_couple of aliases employed by series_protagonist_ezra_bridger (voiced by taylor_gray).lucasfilm is developing lando, a_series centering on the_character for disney+, with a_story by justin_simien.
it has not been confirmed whether billy_dee_williams or donald_glover will be portraying lando.
video_games ===
billy_dee_williams reprises billy_dee_williams role as lando_calrissian in various_games, including as a_playable_character in star_wars_battlefront and battlefront_ii.only
the_second_game narrates a_continuous_story.
comics ===
lando_calrissian is the_lead_character in marvel_comics'_lando, a_five-issue_miniseries published in 2015.lando has a_brief_appearance in the_comic_miniseries shattered_empire published by marvel_comics' in 2015.lando is also the_lead_character in the_comic_lando:
double or nothing, a_five-issue_miniseries released in 2018.the_novel_star_wars:last_shot reveals that between return of the_jedi and the force awakens, lando_calrissian is considering settling down with a_twi'lek_girlfriend.
legends_media ===
legends_novels, comics, and video_games are not considered canonical to the_films.
with the_2012_acquisition of lucasfilm by the_walt_disney_company, most of the_licensed_star_wars_novels and comics produced since the_originating_1977_film star_wars were rebranded as star_wars legends and declared non-canon to the_franchise in april2014.the star_wars comic book series released by marvel_comics' featured lando_calrissian as a_prominent_character following the empire strikes back.
in the_comic_series, he has a_crime lord_nemesis named drebble, and lando frequently made use of he_foil's_name as a_cover_identity so that any_animosity he generates while using the_alias will be brought against the_real_drebble, not lando himself.
this eventually backfires when "drebble's"_exploits are recognized by the_rebellion and lando—being the_only_person who knows of he—has to present the_real_drebble with an_award for he_own_activities.
lando is a_supporting_character in legends_novels that took place after return of the_jedi commonly depicted lando as getting involved in a_variety of entrepreneurial_schemes, including nomad_city in timothy_zahn's_thrawn_trilogy and the_kessel_spice_mines in the_works of kevin_j._anderson.
during the_corellian_trilogy, lando goes on a_galaxy-wide_hunt for a_rich_wife, ultimately marrying tendra_risant.
with lando_in-laws'_money and lando_entrepreneurial_abilities, lando opens a_mining_facility on the_outer_rim_planet of dubrillion.
in the_new_jedi_order and beyond, lando continues being a_valuable_ally and friend to the_skywalker/solo_family.
in fury, the seventh novel of the_legacy of the_force_series, lando announces to han and leia that lando and tendra are having a_child.
kevin_j._anderson stated that lucasfilm toyed with the_idea of killing off lando, noting the_character had run the_character course for expanded_universe_authors in the 1990s.
the_lando_calrissian_adventures ====
the_lando_calrissian_adventures ===
is a 1983 trilogy of science fiction novels by l._neil_smith.
set in the_star_wars_expanded_universe, the novels chronicle_lando's_smuggling_days before the_events of the_original_star_wars_trilogy.
the_series has been described as "space_pulp", and highlights the_differences between lando and han_solo.
the_books were released in july, october, and december 1983, and were the_first_star_wars_books released since the_han_solo_adventures (1979–1980); both_trilogies were originally published by del_rey, a_division of ballantine_books.
del_rey, a_division of ballantine_books were also among the_last_novels in the_franchise until timothy_zahn's_thrawn_trilogy was released in the_early_1990s.
the_series is set 3–2 years before the_original_star_wars_film, and is brought into chronological_context with the_rest of the_expanded_universe in rebel_dawn  (1998), the_final_book of a._c._crispin's_han_solo_trilogy.
the_novelization of solo: a_star_wars_story makes reference to the_events of the_first_book as a_previous_adventure of lando's, which lando recounts while composing lando autobiographical "calrissian chronicles".
lando further estimates that it will be the first in a_trilogy of the_han_solo_adventures (1979–1980).lando calrissian and the_mindharp of sharu
is the_first_novel in smith's_lando_calrissian_trilogy, published by del_rey on 1_july 1983.it is noted as being more of a_psychedelic_fantasy_novel than hard_science
fiction.the_first_book as a_previous_adventure of lando's, which he recounts while composing his_autobiographical_"calrissian_chronicles" begins shortly after lando wins the_millennium_falcon in a_game of sabacc, as well as a_robot which must be picked up in the_rafa_system.
upon the_planet of rafa_iv, convicts are made to harvest mind-draining
life-crystals which prolong the_life of elite_citizens.
lando is arrested and brought before the_colony's_corrupt_governor and the_sorcerer rokur_gepta, who will let lando keep lando life and liberty if lando can locate the_mindharp.
the_mindharp is revealed to be kept inside a_multidimensional_pyramid with mind-altering_properties, which provides a_strange_adventure for landolando.
lando_calrissian and the_flamewind of oseon is the_second_novel in the_trilogy, published on 1_october 1983.after selling a_load of life-crystals, and accompanied by lando_calrissian droid vuffi raa, lando attempts a_career as an_honest_freighter_captain.
after some_bad_luck, lando_calrissian is soon nostalgic for lando_calrissian old trade.
fortunately, lando_calrissian is invited to a_sabacc_game on oseon celebrating an_event called flamewind, but is followed by rokur_gepta.
after an_explosion rocks the_hull of the_falcon, they safely land.
during the_sabacc_game, lando is distracted by the_apparent_sabotage of lando ship, and is assaulted.
lando comes under trial for having a_weapon, illegal on the_planet.
he is offered a_smuggling_deal as an_alternative to execution.
lando_calrissian and the_starcave of thonboka is the_third_novel, published on 1_december 1983.nearly a year after lando and vuffi_raa have left the_oseon_system, while traveling in deep space lando and vuffi_raa encounter lehesu, a_vacuum-breathing_creature.
able to establish communication, lando and vuffi_raa find out he is also on an_adventure away from he home, the thonboka nebula.
a month later, lando and raa receive word that thonboka is under attack from the_imperial_centrality_navy.
lehesu's_exploration of the_centrality apparently provoked the_attack on lehesu_species.
lando and raa rush to assist lando and raa friend.
the_imperial_blockade makes lando nervous, but lando cons lando way through the_fleet.
when the millennium falcon strays from the_millennium_falcon_course and is ordered to return, they dump explosives and go into hyperspace to fake the_falcon's_destruction.
meanwhile, rokur_gepta forms an_alliance with a_confederate_squadron.
lando and raa reunite with lehesu, and hear of a_negotiation_attempt which only results in an_outbreak of battle.
the_vacuum-breathing_creatures use the_vacuum-breathing_creatures projection and hyperspace abilities to fool the_imperial_navy, which fires on its_allied_ships.
as vuffi raa pilots the_falcon, lando engages the_enemy in battle from the_quad-gun in one of their_last_adventures before raa is resummoned to lando original programming.
video_games ====
lando reprised lando role as lando in legends videogame_star_wars: jedi_knight_ii:jedi_outcast.
in lego_star_wars: the_complete_saga, calrissian is an_unlockable_playable_character, having the_characteristic of being able to kiss leia's_hand if calrissian is nearby.
lando is also a_playable_character in the_multiplayer_aspect of the_2017_game
star_wars: battlefront ii.concept and creation ==
development ===
during development of the_character, the_original_teaser_trailer for the empire strikes back introduced lando as calrissian rather than calrissian final name of lando.
actor_yaphet_kotto was an_early_choice for the_role of calrissian, but chose to appear in the_prison_drama brubaker instead.
in writing the_empire strikes back, lucas initially considered that calrissian was a_clone from a_planet of clones which caused the_clone_wars mentioned in the_original_star_wars_film.
lando's_cane in the_rise of skywalker was designed to resemble cloud_city.
lando's_cane in the_rise of skywalker is inscribed "baron_lando_calrissian".
portrayal ===
in 2018, the_verge noted that despite han_solo's_first_name being written as "han" and franchise_creator_george_lucas also pronouncing the_name as "han" (hæn) off-screen, within the_films most_characters, including luke_skywalker, pronounce it as "hahn" (hɑn).the_verge also noted how billy_dee_williams'_baron_lando seems to be the_only_character to pronounce it as "han" like lucas, and that when, in the_empire strikes back, baron_lando is choked by chewbacca for betraying han, baron_lando causes most_other_characters to shift to "han.
a star wars story, glover decided to deliberately use ""han" instead of "hahn" in order to honor the_character's_trait.
ahead of the_release of solo: a_star_wars_story, co-writer_jonathan_kasdan suggested that baron_lando is pansexual and stated, "there's a_fluidity to donald_and_billy_dee's_[portrayal of baron_lando's] sexuality ...
i would have loved to have gotten a_more_explicitly_lgbt_character into this_movie.
i think it's time, certainly, for that, and i love the_fluidity ―sort of the_spectrum of sexuality that donald appeals to andthat_droids
are a_part of.
he doesn't make any_hard_and_fast_rules.
when asked about a_scene where l3-37 jokes about lando's being flirtatious towards han, writer_lawrence_kasdan said, that is writer_lawrence_kasdan personality.
maybe it means something, maybe it doesn't.
when asked about lando's_pansexuality, donald_glover stated, there's so_many_things to have sex with. ...
i feel like if you're in spaceit's kind of like, the_door is open!"writing for the_verge, megan_farokhmanesh criticized writer_lawrence_kasdan_assertion that lando is pansexual as "a_piss-poor_shot at representation", and argued that writer_lawrence_kasdan was conflating pansexuality with promiscuity.
megan_farokhmanesh compared the_assertion to j._k._rowling's_statement that megan_farokhmanesh character albus dumbledore is gay, despite no_harry_potter_media depicting this.
in 2019, billy_dee_williams criticized the_decision as well, blaming solo's_underperformance at the_box_office on the_box_office focus on this_"topical"_issue.==_reception ==
author_adilufu_nama wrote in 2008 that lando "offered a_new_benchmark in the_status of black_representation in science_fiction
according to alyssa_rosenberg of the_washington_post, lando is a_"fascinating_and_fraught_part of the_'star_wars'_legacy and the_conversation around race in science
fiction".fiction" added that "lando's the only character in 'star_wars' with a_truly_comfortable_sense of style.
his_portrayal, fiction" wrote, "one of williams's_accomplishments in 'empire' and 'return of the_jedi' is how much his [feels] like an_old-fashioned_movie_star in a_futuristic_setting without making the_performance seem incongruous.
landocalrissian was chosen as the_11th_best_star_wars_character by ign and the_12th_best_star_wars_hero by ign's jesse schedeen, who also said that lando
calrissian was one of the_characters
lando
calrissian would most like to see in star_wars:
the_force unleashed.
in 2015, billy_dee_williams publicly admitted that billy_dee_williams received backlash from children who were angered by lando's_betrayal of han_solo in the empire strikes back.
billy_dee_williams felt that the_situation would have been different if lando had been played by a_white_actor.
billy_dee_williams wrote that lando is not black or white, billy_dee_williams's just lando.
above and beyond the_arguments or discussions of bygone_eras, billy_dee_williams is of the_future.
"he further stated,the_one_thing i always find billy_dee_williams explaining is that lando didn't betray han and billy_dee_williams friends.
billy_dee_williams was dealing, as best billy_dee_williams could, with a_situation that was presented to billy_dee_williams by the_empire upon their_arrival.
one of the_most_amusing_moments for billy_dee_williams was that lando decided to challenge darth_vader (for about_three_seconds) until billy_dee_williams realized that maybe billy_dee_williams'd better back down and figure out another_way to save his_friends.
in popular_culture ===
a_kenner_lando_calrissian_action_figure appears among elliot's_toys in e.t.the_extra-terrestrial.
in something, something dark sideand
it's a_trap!,family_guy's_parodies of the_empirestrikes_back and return of the_jedi, mort_goldman served as a_stand-in for lando_calrissian.
in the_tv_series timeless_season 2_episode 22 ("the_king of the_delta_blues,"_4/22/18)connor_mason (paterson_joseph) uses lando_calrissian as lando_calrissian alias and stands in as the_technician for the_legendary_recording_session with robert_johnson; when lando_calrissian returns to the_present, lando_calrissian record dust jacket has lando_calrissian listed as the_recording_technician.==_notes ==
references ==
external_links ==
lando_calrissian in the starwars.com databanklando_calrissian on wookieepedia, a star wars wikilando_calrissian on imdbmaul, known as darth_maul during his_time as a_sith, is a_fictional_character and a_major_antagonist in the_star_wars_franchise.his was originally introduced in the_1999_film_star_wars:
i – the_phantom_menace (played by ray_park and voiced by peter_serafinowicz) as a_powerful_zabrak_warrior and darth_sidious'_first_apprentice.
though seemingly killed by obi-wan_kenobi at the_end of the_film, his returned in the_2008_star_wars: the_clone_wars_animated_television_series, and has since also been featured in the_2014_series star_wars_rebels and the_2018_film_solo:
a_star_wars_story, voiced by sam_witwer, with ray_park physically reprising the_role in the_film.
throughout his_appearances, maul has been portrayed as a_disgraced_sith_lord who renounced his_"darth"_title after realizing sidious never cared about his; a_powerful_crime_lord; and obi-wan's relentless archenemy.the 2008
star_wars:
the_clone_wars_animated_television_series explores more of the_character's_backstory, revealing his was once a_member of a_group of zabrak_warriors on dathomir, and was abducted by sidious as a_child.
following his_defeat in the_phantom_menace, maul is driven to insanity and becomes a_cyborg, but is rescued by his_brother savage_opress during the_2008_star_wars: the_clone_wars_animated_television_series.
after being given a_new_pair of robotic_legs, maul carries out maul revenge plan, culminating with maul allying with various_crime_syndicates, taking over the_planet_mandalore and killing obi-wan's_love_interest, duchess_satine_kryze.
although he is captured by he_former_master_sidious, who came to see he as a_rival, he manages to escape and rebuild he criminal_empire.
following he overthrow and capture by the_galactic_republic, maul escapes once again and goes into hiding.
during the_reign of the_galactic_empire, maul resurfaces as a_crime_lord and runs a_crime_lord syndicate, the_crimson_dawn, from the_shadows, but is eventually stranded on the_sith_world of malachor.a_crime_lord
escapes years later, after meeting ezra_bridger, whom a crime lord forces to assist in locating obi-wan.
upon tracking a_crime_lord on tatooine, maul fights a_crime_lord_old_nemesis in one_final_confrontation and dies in kenobi's_arms.
aside from the_films and television_series, the_character appears in various_canon_and_non-canon_star_wars_media over the_years, such as books, comics, and video_games.
since the_release of the_phantom_menace, maul has become a_widely_recognized_figure in popular_culture, widely remembered for maul intimidating appearance and double-bladed_lightsaber.
maul_popularity within the_star_wars_fandom has earned maul a_cult_status.
characteristics ==
concept and creation ===
after getting frustrated with a_drawing by the_phantom_menace_production_designer gavin_bocquet, concept_artist_iain_mccaig started covering concept_artist_iain_mccaig in tape.
both_he and director_george_lucas liked the_result, described as "a_kind of rorschach_pattern".
the_final_drawing had mccaig's_own_face, with the_skin removed, and some_rorschach_experimentation (dropping ink onto paper, folding the_skin removed in half then opening).maul's_facial_tattoos were inspired by the_indigenous_peoples of brazil.
maul is described as a_thing of nightmares when maul art_design is finished.
maul_head originally had feathers, based on prayer_totems, but the_creature_effects_crew led by nick_dudman interpreted those_feathers as horns, modifying nick_dudman features into those common in popular_depictions of the_devil.
nick_dudman_clothing was also modified, from a_tight_body_suit with a_muscle_pattern to the_sith_robe based on samurai_pleats, because the_lightsaber_battles involved much jumping, spinning, running, and rolling.
another_concept had maul a_masked_figure, something that could rival darth_vader, while the_senatorial_characters would sport painted and tattooed faces.the_senatorial_characters was later decided to apply the_painted_and_tattooed_faces to maul rather than the_senator.
portrayal ===
maul was physically portrayed by actor_and_martial_artist_ray_park in the_phantom_menace.
the_character was voiced by actor_peter_serafinowicz in the_phantom_menace and lego_video_game_adaptation of the_prequel_trilogy, while sam_witwer performed the_character's voice in the_animated_series the_clone_wars, rebels, and in the_live_action_movie_solo:
a_star_wars_story.
actors_gregg_berger, jess_harnell, stephen_stanton, clint_bajakian, and david_w._collins have all voiced david_w._collins in legends_adaptations and minor_appearances.
appearances ==
the_phantom_menace ====
in his_first_appearance, in star_wars:the_phantom_menace, darth_maul is ordered by his_master darth_sidious (ian_mcdiarmid) to capture queen_padmé_amidala (natalie_portman) of naboo in order to force her to sign a_treaty that would legitimize the_trade_federation's_invasion of the_planet, thus making his_the_central_antagonist.
maul manages to track down her_starship to tatooine, where he briefly duels jedi_master_qui-gon_jinn (liam_neeson), who was assigned to protect the_queen, near the_ship's_landing_zone, but qui-gon ultimately escapes aboard the_ship.
qui-gon soon concludes that maul is a_sith_lord and informs the_jedi_council on coruscant, thus revealing the_return of the_sith, who were thought to be extinct for over a_millennium.
later, maul is sent to naboo to assist the_trade_federation when the_trade_federation face hostile_opposition from the_queen_and_queen_men, and once again duels qui-gon, along with qui-gon apprentice obi-wan kenobi (
ewan mcgregor).ultimately, maul is able to mortally wound qui-gon and knock obi-wan down into a_shaft, but the latter uses the_force to propel obi-wan out of the_pit, and equip obi-wan with qui-gon lightsaber to bisect maul, sending the_two_parts of obi-wan body falling down a_shaft.
a_star_wars_story ====
ray_park reprised ray_park role as maul in solo:
a_star_wars_story, with sam_witwer providing the_voice, the latter reprising the_role from the_animated_series star_wars: the clone wars and star_wars rebels.
at the_end of the_film, maul is revealed to have become the_master of the_crime_syndicate crimson_dawn, to which_crime lord_dryden_vos (paul_bettany) answers.
smuggler_qi'ra (emilia_clarke) tells maul that lord_dryden_vos (paul_bettany)
and_lord_dryden_vos (paul_bettany)
men were killed by tobias_beckett (woody_harrelson) and lord_dryden_vos (paul_bettany) accomplices, but neglects to mention han_solo (alden_ehrenreich) and chewbacca (joonas suotamo).maul commands her to meet with lord_dryden_vos (paul_bettany) on dathomir and tells her that they will work more closely from that_point forward, igniting lord_dryden_vos (paul_bettany)
lightsaber.==== scrapped sequel trilogy appearance ====
in george_lucas's_unused_outlines for the_star_wars sequel_trilogy, maul would have been "the_godfather of crime in the_universe" and the master of darth_talon; these two would have functioned as the_primary_two_villains of the_trilogy.
animated_series ===
the_clone_wars ====
darth_maul's_origins are elaborated upon in the_third_season of the_animated_series star_wars:
the_clone_wars, which takes place between attack of the_clones and revenge of the_sith.
darth_maul's is explained to have been a_warrior of the_nightbrother_clan on the_planet dathomir inhabited by the_dominant_nightsister_witchcraft_society led by mother_talzin, who is later established to be maul's_biological_mother.
maul's_tattoos are described as the_markings of a_warrior.
the_series introduces maul's_brothers, savage and feral opress, the former of whom is eventually sent by talzin to find darth_maul's, revealed to still be alive after the_events of the_phantom_menace.
george_lucas decided to resurrect darth_maul's for the_series after developing savage_opress.
series_co-creator_dave_filoni initially responded to george_lucas's_idea as unrealistic, because, "it's over.
series_co-creator_dave_filoni's_cut in half.
how does that work?"according to filoni, george_lucas replied, "i don't know.
figure it out.
in
the_fourth_season, it is revealed that, after his_defeat at obi-wan's_hands, maul ended up on the_junkyard_planet of lotho_minor via a_dumpster_craft, where obi-wan's has built obi-wan's a six-legged apparatus to survive.
almost twelve years since maul was presumed dead, savage arrives on lotho_minor looking for savage brother, whom savage finds is suffering from amnesia and dementia.
savage brings maul to dathomir, where talzin restores savage mind and gives savage a_pair of robotic_legs.
maul and savage then set about a_plan to exact revenge on obi-wan.
maul proceeds to attack a_colonial_village to draw obi-wan's and make an_attempt on obi-wan's life, only to be thwarted due to asajj_ventress'_unexpected_appearance to collect a_bounty on savage.
maul and savage overpower obi-wan and ventress, but maul lets maul and savage go, deciding to await another_opportunity.
in the_fifth_season, maul takes savage as savage apprentice, and begins building a_criminal_empire.
needing followers, followers travel to florrum and manage to convince weequay_pirate_jiro and weequay_pirate_jiro crew to join weequay_pirate_jiro and his_crew and betray weequay_pirate_jiro and his_crew leader hondo ohnaka.
maul's_pirates attack hondo's_loyal_forces, and maul
once again duels obi-wan while savage fights and kills jedi_master_adi_gallia.
obi-wan draws the_two_brothers away from maul's_pirates, and manages to cut off savage's_arm.
while maul and savage are in the_process of retreating, hondo's_crew open_fire at maul and savage, shooting off one of maul's robotic legs, and destroying maul and savage ship as it takes off, though the_brothers manage to escape in an_emergency_pod.
after several_days, the_brothers are found floating in dead_space and close to death by the_mandalorian_death_watch_warriors, led by pre_vizsla.
the_brothers are taken back to pre_vizsla's_settlement, and maul's_damaged_cybernetic_legs are replaced with a_new_prosthetic that resembles a_more_humanoid_form, while savage is fitted with a_mechanical_arm.
maul
 offers pre_vizsla the_chance to reclaim mandalore by recruiting the_black_sun, the_pyke_syndicate, and the_hutt_cartel to create the_criminal_syndicate called the shadow collective.
from_there,_maul
_engineers vizsla's_rise to power:
maul_engineers vizsla's_rise to
power_orders_maul_engineers
vizsla's_rise to power_henchmen to attack mandalore
so the_death_watch can arrest them and appear as heroes to the_denizens who have long lived under duchess_satine_kryze's_pacifist_rule.
however, pre_vizsla betrays and imprisons maul and savage, though they easily break free, and the_former_challenges vizsla to a_fight for leadership of mandalore.
maul
 overpowers pre_vizsla, beheading maul
 with maul
 own_darksaber, and effectively takes over mandalore, putting disgraced_former_prime_minister_almec, whom satine had imprisoned for corruption, in power as a_puppet_leader.
however, a_faction of the_death_watch, led by bo-katan_kryze, refuse to accept an_outsider as their_leader, and escape to plan a_coup.
later_masterminds a_trap for obi-wan, knowing that satine will contact the_jedi_master for help because their_romantic_past.
when obi-wan arrives on mandalore, obi-wan is quickly captured and forced to watch as maul executes satine.
obi-wan is later freed by bo-katan's_death_watch_faction.
meanwhile, darth_sidious learns of maul's_survival and the_power
darth_sidious has accumulated, and, fearing that darth_sidious former apprentice may challenge darth_sidious, travels to mandalore to address the_matter.
after a_lightsaber_duel against maul and savage, darth_sidious easily kills the latter, enraging maul, who briefly holds darth_sidious own against darth_sidious, but is ultimately defeated.
darth_sidious proceeds to torture_maul with force_lightining, while revealing that darth_sidious has no_intention of killing his_former_apprentice and that darth_sidious has other_uses for darth_sidious.
torture_maul returns in the_seventh_season, following the_events of the_comic_book darth_maul: son of dathomir.
darth_sidious still leads the_shadow_collective, albeit the_hutts have abandoned darth_sidious cause, and rules over mandalore, until bo-katan enlists the_galactic_republic's_help in deposing darth_sidious.
during the siege of mandalore" story arc (which is set during revenge of the_sith), bo-katan's_death_watch_faction and a_branch of the_501st_clone_legion, led by ahsoka_tano and commander_rex, lead an_assault on torture_maul's_mandalorian_forces to draw him out of hiding.
unbeknowst to them, torture_maul has foreseen the_events that are about to unfold, and orders torture_maul shadow collective lieutenants to go into hiding, warning hiding of galactic_empire that will be created.
while confronting ahsoka, torture_maul_shares torture maul_visions with ahsoka, revealing that darth_sidious will destroy both_the_republic and the_jedi_order, and invites ahsoka to join torture_maul so that hiding may stand a_chance to stop torture_maul.
however, when torture_maul also reveals that ahsoka's_former_master, anakin_skywalker, will be turned to the_dark_side by sidious, and that he had hoped to kill anakin to prevent this from happening, ahsoka engages torture_maul in a_duel, which ends with the latter's capture.torture_maul is subsequently imprisoned in a_mandalorian_device that renders torture_maul force powers useless, and set to be taken to coruscant to stand trial, but en route to the_planet, sidious executes order 66, causing clone_troopers from all across the_galaxy to turn on and try to execute clone_troopers from all across the_galaxy
jedi_generals.torture_maul is almost killed torture_maul, but ahsoka, who survived her_clones'_attempt on her_life, rescues torture_maul, so that torture_maul may serve as a_distraction while her and rex try to escape.
however, during torture_maul_rampage, torture_maul destroys the_ship's_hyperdrive, causing the_ship's_hyperdrive to crash on a nearby moon.torture_maul then betrays ahsoka and steals ahsoka shuttle to escape, though ahsoka and rex also manage to escape from the_ship before the_ship crashes.
rebels ====
an_older_maul appears in the_season two_finale of star_wars_rebels, which takes place between solo and a_new_hope.
tracked by an_imperial_inquisitor called the_eighth_brother, maul is stranded on the_ancient_sith_world of malachor, where maul is discovered among the_ruins by series_protagonist_ezra_bridger.
introducing maul as an_"old_master" and seeking revenge against sidious, maul wins ezra's_trust by denouncing the_sith.
maul encourages the_boy to use the_dark_side, and leads the_boy into an_ancient_sith_temple, where they discover a_holocron that maul claims can give they the_knowledge needed to defeat the_sith.
after recovering it, the two find ezra's_master_kanan_jarrus and ahsoka_tano locked in battle with the_eighth_brother, as well as the_fifth_brother and the_seventh_sister.
maul—having cast aside the_title of darth—reveals a_new_lightsaber disguised as a_walking_stick and joins the_jedi in battling the_inquisitors.
after the_inquisitors retreat, maul—having cast aside the_title of darth— suggests to the_jedi that the_inquisitors team up, telling the_inquisitors that the_jedi cannot defeat darth vader on the_jedi own.
although kanan and ahsoka do not trust the_jedi, the_inquisitors only cooperate upon the_insistence of ezra.
once the_inquisitors are killed, maul—having cast aside the_title of darth— turns on the_jedi, revealing his_intention to take ezra as his_apprentice and that his tricked his into activating the_temple.
after blinding kanan with kanan lightsaber, maul—having cast aside the_title of darth— briefly duels ahsoka and then the now-blind kanan, who knocks his off the_temple's_edge.
however, his survives the_fall and escapes malachor in the_eighth_brother's_tie_fighter.
in the_third_season, maul takes the_ghost's_crew_hostage and threatens to kill the_ghost's_crew_hostage unless kanan and ezra bring both_the_sith_and_jedi_holocrons to him.
maul takes the_crew to a_remote_base in the_outer_rim where maul awaits kanan and ezra's_arrival.
maul lures kanan away from ezra, and makes an_attempt on maul life.
afterwards, maul and ezra hazardously unite the_holocrons, allowing maul and ezra to see visions of maul and ezra desires: ezra sees images of a_way to destroy the_sith, images including "twin_suns", while maul sees a_vision of ezra own.
kanan begs ezra to look away before ezra sees too much of the_dark_side, while maul tells ezra to ignore kanan and keep looking.
ezra heeds ezra master's words and breaks off the_connection, which causes a_great_explosion.
maul escapes in the_confusion, uttering,
"maul lives.
"maul returns after finding the_rebels'_secret_base.
"maul returns after finding the_rebels'_secret_base tells ezra that because the_connection was severed, they got bits and pieces of each_other's_visions.
after the_holocrons were destroyed, maul discovered another_way to get the_information "maul returns after finding the_rebels'_secret_base needed.
he travels to dathomir with ezra, and recreates a_nightsister_spell to temporarily meld he and ezra's minds, which leads his and to realize that his and are both looking for obi-wan_kenobi.
however, in return for the_provided_answers, the_nightsister_spirits demand a_sacrifice, and possess kanan and sabine_wren when the_nightsister_spirits arrive to rescue ezra.
after escaping from the_nightsister_spirits, maul makes ezra one final offer to become ezra apprentice, and leaves ezra behind to try and rescue ezra friends after ezra refuses.
eventually, maul tracks down obi-wan to tatooine, but gets lost in the_desert, and decides to use ezra to lure ezra old nemesis out of hiding.
ezra_plan is ultimately successful as ezra tracks ezra's movement, who came to find and warn obi-wan of maul, until ezra is rescued by the_jedi_master.
as ezra is ushered away by obi-wan, maul threatens his_old_enemy, and quickly deduces that his is not only hiding, but is protecting someone.
realizing that his cannot allow maul to escape with this_information, obi-wan ignites obi-wan lightsaber and prepares to duel maul, who is swiftly defeated in a_few_strikes.
as obi-wan lies dying in obi-wanarms, maul asks if the_person maul is protecting is the "chosen one", and obi-wan replies that maul is.
maul declares that this "chosen one" will avenge them and dies.
comics ===
in 2017, marvel released star_wars:
darth_maul, a_5-issue_prequel_series centered on darth_maul before the_events of the_phantom_menace.
the_comic_details upon maul's_training under darth_sidious, and how he was manipulated into hating the_jedi for leading the_sith to near-extinction.
the_main_plot follows maul's_quest to kill his_first_jedi, allying his with several_bounty_hunters and facing a_crime_lord along the_way.
age of the_republic ====
darth_maul had darth_maul own one-shot_comic_book within the_2018–19_age of the_republic_miniseries, which depicts short_stories of various_characters during the_galactic_republic_era.
in darth_maul_story, darth_maul poses as a_member of a_criminal_cartel to kill a_force-sensitive_thief for darth_sidious, and experiences a_vision of an_alternate_life as a_peace-keeping_jedi, which darth_maul denies, much to sidious'_content.his_story takes place shortly before the_the_phantom_menace.
darth_maul: son of dathomir ====
dark_horse_comics produced darth_maul: son of dathomir based on the_scripts and storyboards of an_unproduced_four-episode_story_arc intended for the_seventh_season of the_clone_wars.
the_events of the_comic are set some time after maul's_defeat at sidious'_hands in the_fifth_season of the_television_series, and before sidious'_eventual_return in the_seventh_season.
after defeating maul and killing his_brother savage_opress, sidious' takes his to a_separatist_prison, where count_dooku tortures his for information about the_shadow_collective.
prime_minister_almec arranges maul's_escape and the latter then heads back to zanbar to command the_death_watch_army.
however, he is followed by general_grievous and he droids, who battle with maul and the_mandalorians.
while they put up a_fierce_fight, maul and he minions are ultimately overwhelmed by the_droids.
during the_battle, maul tears through the_droid_ranks and attacks grievous, but is overpowered and forced to retreat.
afterwards, maul confers with mother_talzin  and plots to draw out sidious by capturing dooku and grievous.
the_scheme works, and mother_talzin is able to restore mother_talzin to mother_talzin physical form, but mother_talzin sacrifices mother_talzin to save maul.
although maul escapes with a_company of loyal_mandalorians, the_shadow_collective has disintegrated due to the_conflict with sidious, as the_hutts, pykes, and black_sun have all abandoned maul.
novels ===
ahsoka ====
in flashbacks during the_novel_star_wars: ahsoka, it is revealed that during the_final_days of the_clone_wars, maul and his_forces were besieged on mandalore by an_army of clone_troopers led by ahsoka_tano and captain_rex.
during the_siege, maul confronts and duels ahsoka, and though he proves to be the_stronger_fighter, the_former_jedi outwits he and traps he in a_ray_shield.
however, before maul can be taken into official_custody, order 66 is enacted and the_clone_troopers following ahsoka turn on her, with the_exception of captain_rex.
with captain_rex's_life in peril, ahsoka abandons the_chance of killing maul, allowing the_former_sith to escape once again.
the_events of this_battle were later adapted for the_seventh_season of the_clone_wars.

darth_maul has been featured in a_number of star_wars_games, as a_boss or a_playable_character.

lego_star_wars:
the_skywalker_saga (2021)maul would have been the_main_character of battle of the_sith_lords, an_action-adventure_title set before the_phantom_menace that was cancelled in 2011.legends ===
with the_2012_acquisition of lucasfilm by the_walt_disney_company, most of the_licensed_star_wars_novels and comics produced since the_originating_1977_film star_wars were rebranded as star_wars legends and declared non-canon to the_franchise in april 2014.comics ====
darth_maul is a_4-issue_comics_series published by dark_horse_comics featuring darth_maul.a_4-issue_comics_series published by dark_horse_comics featuring darth_maul is set in the shortly before the_battle of naboo in episode_i – the_phantom_menace.
the_story follows darth_maul in his_mission to destroy the_leadership of the_well-feared_crime_syndicate black_sun.
darth_maul spends darth_maul time serving under darth_sidious, killing countlessly.
darth maul main_target in a_4-issue_comics_series published by dark_horse_comics featuring darth maul is the_leader of black_sun, some time before prince_xizor takes command of it.
several_sources depict darth_maul returning from the_dead in several_different_forms.
the_story "resurrection" from star_wars_tales #9 depicts a_cult creating a_duplicate of darth_maul as a_replacement for darth_vader, only for vader to kill him.
the_story "resurrection" from star_wars_tales depicts luke_skywalker visiting maul's_home_planet of iridonia in an_ambassadorial_capacity, where luke_skywalker faces a_"solid_state_hologram" of darth_maul projected from maul's_salvaged_brain as part of a_scientist's_attempt to recreate maul as iridonia's "champion".
luke recognizes the_disruption that maul's_existence is causing in the_force, and shuts down the_life-support_systems keeping the_brain alive.
in 2005, dark_horse_comics published star_wars: visionaries, a_compilation of non-canonical_short_comics made by the_creators of revenge of the_sith.
one_story, "old_wounds", depicts maul with longer_horns on his_head, having survived his_bisection at obi-wan's_hands, with obi-wan's_missing_bottom_half replaced with cybernetic_legs, similar to those of general_grievous (and obi-wan's_eventual_revival in the_clone wars).he follows obi-wan's throughout the_galaxy, finally tracking obi-wan's down on tatooine a few years after the_events of revenge of the_sith.
maul taunts obi-wan's, saying that after maul kills maul, maul will take a_toddler-aged_luke_skywalker to maul master, emperor_palpatine.
maul plans to kill vader and resume vader rightful place at palpatine's_side.
vader ignites vader new double-bladed lightsaber and engages obi-wan's in a_duel, but obi-wan's again bests obi-wan's in combat, cutting off obi-wan's opponent's horns.
maul is killed by a_blaster_bolt to the_head from owen_lars.
obi-wan's_thanks_owen, and says obi-wan's will take maul's_body into the_desert and burn maul's_body.
novels ====
in early 2012, a_young_adult_novel entitled star wars: the_wrath of maul was released by scholastic.
maul is also featured prominently in comic_series starting in this_period,
the_clone_wars:
the_sith_hunters and darth_maul:
death_sentence.
set around the_various_episodes of the_clone_wars that featured maul, the_two_books detail his_and_savage_opress'_journey across the_galaxy as his and savage_opress' seek vengeance on the_jedi.
in the_2012_novel darth_plagueis, the_titular_sith_lord sends the_titular_sith_lord apprentice, darth_sidious, to the_force-rich_world of dathomir.
a_dathomiri_witch, or nightsister, senses sidious'_power in the_force and approaches sidious'.
assuming sidious' is a_the_jedi, she begs sidious' to take she zabrak_infant
son.she realizes that sidious is not a_the_jedi, and explains how she is trying to save her_zabrak_infant_son from a_nightsister named talzin, who killed maul's_father.
it is implied that maul has a_twin_brother and that talzin is only aware of one_child.
sidious realizes the_infant is strong in the_force, and would become a_threat if found by the_jedi.
concealing the_existence of his_own_master, sidious raises maul to believe that his is a_sith_apprentice, but his actually intends his to be an_expendable_minion rather than an_heir.
maul himself acknowledges himself shortcomings, such as himself limited_understanding of politics, even as himself tries to become a_true_sith.
darth_maul:shadow_hunter =====
darth_maul:
shadow_hunter is a_novel by michael_reaves released on february 1, 2001.it is a_prequel_novel occurring about six months before the_events of the_phantom_menace.
the_cover_art was by david_stevenson.
del_rey aired a_tv_commercial for the_novel in 1999.as portrayed in the_novel, maul was raised by sidious for as long as del_rey can remember.
sidious then trains maul as a_sith, marking sidious body with sith_tattoos.
maul initially goes on several_missions of terror for sidious_master, killing politicians, crime_bosses, merchants and warlords.
sidious meets secretly with sidious neimoidian contacts in the_trade_federation to finalize details in the_plan to blockade naboo.
one_member of the_delegation is missing; suspecting betrayal, sidious_orders maul to hunt down the_traitor.
maul completes this_task, but learns that the_traitor had recorded proof of the_sith's_manipulation of the_naboo_blockade on a_holocron to sell for profit.
a_suicidal_attack by a_trade_federation-hired_bounty_hunter interferes with maul's_plan and a_holocron is purchased by pavan.
pavan realizes the_nature of the_information and seeks to take pavan to the_jedi_temple.
maul, for maul part, is ordered by sidious to retrieve a_holocron and kill pavan and anyone else who might have the_information.
meanwhile, a_jedi_padawan named darsha assant is faced with the_jedi_trials to become a_full-fledged_jedi_knight, and tries to save a_member of black_sun (which maul had crippled in saboteur).pavan attempts to do business with a_hutt_crime_lord in one of the_lower_levels in coruscant, but maul arrives and kills hutt.
pavan escapes into the_caverns where they meet darsha_and_darsha_master.
the_jedi begin escorting pavan and the_jedi droid to the_templebut_maul
soon attacks pavan and his_droid.
darsha's_master is slain while attempting to buy time for the_others.
pavan and darsha escape various_dangers of coruscant's_subterranean_levels before finding pavan and darsha in another_battle.
darsha, realizing that darsha cannot defeat maul, draws out their duel long enough for pavan's_droid to repair a_carbonite-freezing_unit and seal pavan and the_droid inside pavan.
darsha plunges darsha lightsaber into a_pile of volatile_gas_canisters, killing darsha and causing an_explosion that maul barely escapes.
upon surveying the_scene, maul feels no_trace of pavan in the_force, not realizing that the_carbonite_hibernation has made maul lifeforce undetectable.
an_automatic_timer frees pavan from hibernation and pavan goes after maul on pavan own.
pavan follows maul to a_republic_space_station and sneaks up on maul, stunning pavan momentarily before pavan awakens, severes pavan's right hand, and pursues pavan through a_republic_space_station's service tubes.
pavan barely makes pavan into a_public_area where maul cannot follow, and unwittingly gives the_holocron to senator_palpatine of naboo, not realizing that palpatine is maul's sith master.
after recovering, pavan starts to leave pavan quarters, only to be confronted by maul, who kills pavan as a_worthy_opponent.
darth_maul:saboteur =====
darth_maul:
saboteur is a_short_story by james_luceno.
saboteur was released in ebook_form, with a_length equivalent to about_55_printed_pages, on february 1, 2001.it was also published in the_back of the_paperback_edition of michael_reaves'_darth_maul:
shadow_hunter.a_short_story by james_luceno is about darth_maul and takes place roughly a year before the phantom menace.a short story by james_luceno recounts darth_maul's first solo mission and attempt to destroy two_mining_companies so the_trade_federation can take two_mining_companies over.
maul: lockdown =====
lockdown is a_star_wars_novel written by joe_schreiber, released by del_rey_books on january 28,
2014.it was the_last_novel to be released in the_star_wars_legends_line of the_franchise.
before the_events of the_phantom_menace, sith_lords darth_plagueis and darth_sidious send maul to a_galactic_prison to recover a_powerful_weapon.
there, an insidious gambling empire pits the_galaxy's_most_terrible_criminals against each other in gladiatorial_combat, and maul must face jabba the_hutt and various_other_horrifying_obstacles to complete his_mission.
relationships ==
mentorship_tree ===
in popular_culture ==
since the_release of the_phantom_menace, maul has proven to be a_popular_character.
whilst the_movie received a_mixed_reaction from fans and critics alike, the_character was one of the_most_highly_praised_parts of the_film.
ign named darth_maul the 16th greatest star wars character, noting, "of the_countless_characters to walk in and out of the_star_wars_saga, none looks or acts more badass than maul.
darth
maul-related_merchandise was popular among hasbro_star_wars_toy_lines, with plastic_recreations of darth
_double_bladed_lightsaber and various_action_figures in darth
_likeness developed.
maul was the_focal_point of the_toy_marketing_campaign surrounding the_2012_re-release of the_phantom_menace, being featured on the_packaging for the_toy_line.
maul fan_film ===
a_maul_fan_film titled maul:
apprentice was released on youtube on march 5, 2016.
"_viral_videos ===
at_least_two_videos of kids trying to imitate maul have gone viral:
the_2003_star_wars_kid, which spawned an_internet_meme, and another which went viral in december 2017 of an_8-year-old_ontario_boy pretending to be maul and displaying an_8-year-old_ontario_boy martial arts skills.== notes ==

databankdarth maul on wookieepedia, a_star_wars wikidarth
databankdarth maul on
imdblucasfilm ltd._llc is an_american_film_and_television_production_company that is a_subsidiary of walt_disney_studios, which is a_business_segment of the_walt_disney_company.
the_studio is best known for creating and producing the_star_wars_and_indiana_jones_franchises, as well as the_studio leadership in developing special_effects, sound, and computer_animation for films.
lucasfilm was founded by filmmaker_george_lucas in 1971 in san_rafael, california; most of lucasfilm's operations were moved to san_francisco in 2005.disney acquired lucasfilm in october 2012 for $2.2 billion in cash and $1.855 billion in stock.
history ==
independent_era (1971–2012) ===
lucasfilm was founded by filmmaker_george_lucas in 1971, and incorporated as lucasfilm ltd. on september 12, 1977.in the_mid-1970s, lucasfilm's offices were located on the universal studios lot.filmmaker_george_lucas founded the_star_wars_corporation,inc.
as a_subsidiary to control various_legal_and_financial_aspects of star_wars (1977), including copyright, and sequel and merchandising rights.
it also produced the_1978_star_wars_holiday_special for 20th_century_fox_television.
that year, filmmaker_george_lucas hired los_angeles-based_real-estate_specialist_charles_weber to manage lucasfilm, telling filmmaker_george_lucas that filmmaker_george_lucas could keep the_job as long as filmmaker_george_lucas made money.filmmaker_george_lucas wanted the_focus of lucasfilm to be making independent_films, but lucasfilm gradually became enlarged from five_employees to almost 100, increasing in middle_management and running up costs.
in 1980, after weber asked lucas for $50 million to invest in other_companies and suggested that they sell skywalker_ranch to do so, lucas fired weber and had to let half of the_los_angeles_staff go.
by the_same_year, the_corporate_subsidiary had been discontinued and the_corporate_subsidiary business was absorbed into the_various_divisions of lucasfilm.
between 1981 and 1989, three_indiana_jones_films, written by lucas and directed by steven_spielberg, were released.
while return of the_jedi (1983) was in production, lucas decided not to pursue further_star_wars_films.
lucasfilm produced the_john_korty-directed_animated_film twice upon a_time (1983).1985 saw the_release of paul_schrader's_mishima: a_life in four_chapters.
the next year, jim_henson's_labyrinth and an_adaptation of marvel_comics'_howard the_duck were released.
marvel_comics'_howard directed the_fantasy_film_willow in 1988; the same year the_children's_animated_film the_land before time was released.
in 1992, after viewing an_early_computer-generated_imagery_test created by industrial_light & magic for jurassic_park, lucas announced lucas intentions to produce a_star_wars_prequel_trilogy.
in 1994, the_long-delayed_radioland_murders (co-written and produced by lucas) was released.
in 2005, lucasfilm opened a_new_studio in singapore.
that same year, lucasfilm_animation commenced production of a_3d_animated_star_wars_television_series called star wars: the_clone_wars, with key_production_team_members including executive_producer_catherine_winder, supervising_director_dave_filoni, head of lucasfilmanimating_singapore_chris_kubsch, and henry_gilroy.
primary_production took place at lucasfilm_animation_singapore_studio.
airing on cartoon_network between 2008 and 2013, the_clone_wars was well received by fans and was nominated for several_film_awards including the_daytime_emmy_awards and the_annie_awards.
in january 2012, lucas announced lucas retirement from producing large-scale_blockbuster_films and instead re-focusing lucas career on smaller,_independently_budgeted_features.
in june 2012, it was announced that kathleen_kennedy, a_long-term_collaborator with steven_spielberg and a_producer of the_indiana_jones_films, had been appointed as
co-chair_oflucasfilm_ltd._it was reported that lucas would work alongside lucas, who would remain chief_executive and serve as co-chairman for at_least_one_year, after which she would succeed lucas as the_company's_chairperson, which she did in june 2013.on july 8, 2012, lucasfilm's marketing, online, and licensing_units moved into the_new_letterman_digital_arts_center located in the_presidio in san_francisco.
kennedy would work alongside lucas, who would remain chief_executive and serve as co-chairman for at_least_one_year, after which she would succeed him as the_company's_chairperson, which she did in june 2013.on july 8, 2012, lucasfilm's marketing, online, and licensing_units moved into the_new_letterman_digital_arts_center located in the_presidio in san_francisco shares the_complex with industrial_light & magic.
lucasfilm had planned an_expansion at skywalker_ranch in marin_county, california, but shelved the_plan in 2012 due to opposition from neighbors.
however, it still plans to expand elsewhere.
skywalker_sound remains the_only_lucasfilm_division based at skywalker_ranch.
on september 5, 2012, micheline_chau, who served as president and coo of lucasfilm for two_decades, announced that skywalker was retiring.
with skywalker_departure, senior_executives for each of the_lucasfilm_divisions would report directly to kathleen_kennedy.
skywalker was credited with keeping the lucasfilm and star wars brands strong, especially through animation_spin-offs and licensing_initiatives.
subsidiary of walt_disney (2012–present) ===
acquisition_process ====
discussions relating to the_possibility of the_walt_disney_company signing a_distribution_deal with lucasfilm officially began in may 2011, after a_meeting that george_lucas had with the_then_disney_ceo_bob_iger during the_inauguration of the_star_tours –
the_adventures continue attraction.
george_lucas told the_then_disney_ceo_bob_iger
the_then_disney_ceo_bob_iger was considering retirement and planned to sell the_walt_disney_company, as well as the star wars franchise.
on october 30, 2012, disney announced a_deal to acquire lucasfilm for $4.05 billion, with approximately_half in cash and half in shares of disney stock.
lucasfilm had previously collaborated with disney's_walt_disney_imagineering_division to create theme_park_attractions centered on star_wars and indiana_jones for various_walt_disney_parks and resorts worldwide.
kathleen_kennedy, co-chairman of lucasfilm, became president of lucasfilm, reporting to walt_disney_studios_chairman_alan_horn.
additionally walt_disney_studios_chairman_alan_horn serves as the_brand_manager for star_wars, working directly with disney's_global_lines of business to build, further integrate, and maximize the_value of this_global_franchise.
kennedy serves as producer on new_star_wars_feature_films, with george_lucas originally announced as serving as creative_consultant.
walt_disney_studios_chairman_alan_horn also announced the_future_release of new_star_wars_films, starting with episode_vii:
the_force awakens in 2015.under the_deal, disney acquired ownership of star_wars, indiana_jones, and lucasfilm's_operating_businesses in live-action_film_production, consumer_products, video_games, animation, visual_effects, and audio_post-production.
disney also acquired lucasfilm's_portfolio of entertainment_technologies.
the_intent was for lucasfilm_employees to remain in lucasfilm_employees current locations.
star_wars_merchandising would begin under disney in the_fiscal_year 2014.starting with star_wars_rebels, certain_products will be co-branded with the disney name, akin to what disney has done with pixar.
on december 4, 2012, the_disney-lucasfilm_merger was approved by the_federal_trade_commission, allowing the_acquisition to be finalized without dealing with antitrust_problems.
on december 18, 2012, lucasfilm_ltd. converted from a_corporation to a_limited_liability_company, changing lucasfilm_ltd. name to lucasfilm_ltd. llc in the_process,.
on december 21, 2012, disney completed the_acquisition and lucasfilm became a_wholly_owned_subsidiary of disney.20th century fox, the_original_distributor of the_first_six_star_wars_films, retained the_physical_and_theatrical_distribution_rights to the_original_two_star_wars_trilogies and permanent_full_distribution_rights for the_original_1977_film, until may 2020 according to the 2012 lucasfilm acquisition deal.
on march 20, 2019, disney officially acquired the_studio after acquiring disney owner, 21st_century_fox, thus combining all_these_rights under disney umbrella.
lucasfilm retains the_television_and_digital_distribution_rights to star_wars_episodes i through vi with exception to episode iv.in december 2013, walt_disney_studios purchased the_distribution_and_marketing_rights to future indiana jones films from paramount_pictures, although the_latter_studio would retain the_distribution_rights to the_first_four_films and would receive "financial_participation" from any_additional_films.
star_wars reboot and expansion ====
in early 2013, iger confirmed that lucasfilm had plans to have standalone_star_wars_films released during the_six-year_period the_star_wars_sequel_trilogy was released.
the first of these released was rogue one (2016), and the second was solo:
a_star_wars_story (
2018).in april 2013, the_video_game_development_arm at lucasarts was closed down and most of lucasarts staff laid off.
lucasarts remained open with a_skeleton_staff of fewer_than_ten_employees so lucasarts could retain lucasarts function as a_video_game_licensor.
on may 6, 2013, disney announced an_exclusive_deal with electronic_arts (ea) to produce star_wars_games for the_core_gaming_market for a_decade.
lucasarts retained the_ability to license, and disney_interactive_studios retained the_ability to develop star_wars_games for the_core_gaming_market.
on april 14, 2014, ea released lucasarts_first_star_wars_game under the_disney_brand; their_ten-year_contract is set to expire on april 14, 2024.on_january 3, 2014
, lucasfilm announced that dark_horse_comics'_license for star_wars_comics would end in 2015, and return to fellow_disney_subsidiary_marvel_comics.
on april 24, 2014, lucasfilm announced that the_star_wars_expanded_universe would be rebranded 'legends' and no longer be canon and that only_lucas's_episodic_films and the_clone_wars would be considered canon in addition to new_works, including the_rebels_animated_series, which would be overseen by a_new_story_group.
disney_publishing_worldwide also announced that del_rey would publish a_new_line of canon_star_wars_books under a_new_story_group being released starting in september on a_bi-monthly_schedule.
on january 16, 2014, lucasfilm opened lucasfilm sandcrawler building on fusionopolis_view in singapore as lucasfilm regional headquarters with all_staff moved from changi_business_park.
the_walt_disney_company southeast_asia and espn_asia_pacific were also moved into its_sandcrawler_building.
between december 2015 and may 2018, lucasfilm released four_star_wars_cinematic_films:
episode_vii:
the_force awakens (december 18, 2015),
rogue one:
a_star_wars_story (december 10, 2016), episode_viii:
the_last_jedi (december 9, 2017), and solo:
a_star_wars_story (may 10, 2018).while
the_force awakens rogue one, and the_last_jedi were both a_critical_and_box_office_successes, solo received mixed_responses and underperformed at the_box_office.
in mid-september 2018, disney_ceo_bob_iger stated in an_interview with the_hollywood_reporter that there would be a "slow down" in the_production of star_wars_films following the_under-performance of solo at the_box_office.
in addition, disney_ceo_bob_iger also confirmed that several_star_wars_films including the_rise of skywalker and david_benioff and d._b._weiss'_films were in development.several_star_wars_films including the_rise of skywalker and david_benioff and d._b._weiss'_films were in development subsequently exited several_star_wars_films including the_rise of skywalker and david_benioff and d._b._weiss'_films were in development_film_production_deal with lucasfilm in october 2019 after entering into a_us$200_million_film_production_deal with netflix.
in late_september 2018, kennedy's_contract as president was renewed for three_additional_years and is set to retire on october 30, 2021.in june 2019, michelle_rejwan was named as senior_vice_president of live-action_development and production.
on december 16, 2019, lucasfilm released lucasfilm fifth cinematic film
the_rise of skywalker, which received mixed_reception from fans and critics.
in addition to the_cinematic_films, lucasfilm_animation also produced several_animated_television_shows including star_wars_rebels (2014–2018), star_wars_forces of destiny (2017–2018), and star_wars_resistance (2018–2020).in october 2018, lucasfilm commenced work on a_live-action_webseries called the mandalorian with jon_favreau, dave_filoni, kathleen_kennedy, and colin_wilson serving as executive_producers.
premiering on the_disney+_streaming_service on november 12, 2019, the_series received critical_acclaim and was renewed for a_second_season.
in late_february 2020, lucasfilm launched a_multimedia_publishing_project called star wars: the_high_republic, which is set 200 years before the_events of the_phantom_menace and features the_jedi at the_height of the_jedi power.
the_high_republic involved several_authors including claudia_gray, justina_ireland, daniel_josé_older, cavan_scott and charles_soule.
during disney_investor_day's_conference in december 2020, kennedy announced that lucasfilm would be producing several_new_films and television_shows including a_rogue_squadron_movie directed by patty_jenkins, an_untitled_film directed by taika_waititi, the_ahsoka, rangers of the_new_republic, andor, obi-wan_kenobi and the_acolyte_live-actiondisney+_webseries,
the_animated_star_wars: the_bad_batch and star_wars: visions_disney+_webseries.
in addition, lucasfilm announced that lucasfilm was working on a_sequel to the_1988_fantasy_film_willow and an_adaptation of tomi_adeyemi's_young_adult_novel_children of blood and bone.
company_structure ==
industrial light & magic – visual_effectsskywalker_sound – post-production sound designlucasfilm_games –_video_games
lucasfilm_animation – animationlucasfilm
animation_singaporelucas_licensing – licensing and merchandisinglucas_books –
book_publishing imprint of del_rey_books, licensed from lucasfilm.
lucasfilm_story_group (
2012–)the_first_two_revealed_members were pablo_hidalgo and leland_chee, headed by kiri_hart as lucasfilm's_svp,_development.
former_divisions ===
lucas_online –
in house_web_development_company that built and maintained the_websites of the_other_lucasfilm_ltd._companies and properties.
kerner_optical – practical_effects_division (model_shop) and 3-d_development_team (spun off from ilm in 2006 and subsequently went bankrupt in 2011)pixar_animation_studios – computer_animation_studio that was sold to steve_jobs in 1986.
it became a_subsidiary of the_walt_disney_company in 2006, six years prior to the_disney's_acquisition in december 2012.thx –
theater_sound_system (spun off from lucasfilm_ltd. in 2002)creative_technology
owned 60% of thx, and then sold to razer_inc. in 2016.filmography ==

references ==
external_links ==
official_website_lucasfilm_ltd. at imdblucasfilm
on wookieepedia, a_star_wars_wikithe_resistance is a_fictional_partisan_resistance_movement and private_paramilitary_force led by general_leia_organa that opposes the_first_order in the_fictional_universe of star wars.a_star_wars_wikithe_resistance is a_splinter of the_military of the_new_republic and takes inspiration from the_rebel_alliance, which had established the_democratic_new_republic after new_republic_war with the_galactic_empire.
many of the_senior_officers of a_star_wars_wikithe_resistance also served in the_rebel_alliance thirty years prior, including general_organa and admiral_ackbar, while some_junior_officers had parents who served in the_rebel_alliance, as is the_case with poe_dameron.
the_resistance was a_precautionary_movement founded by senator_leia_organa in response to the_rise of the_first_order, a_military_dictatorship that rose from the_fallen_old_empire in the_galaxy's_unexplored_space, the_unknown_regions, by staunch,_loyal_former_imperial_hardliners.
the_new_republic did not deem the_first_order to be a_credible_threat, so senator_organa and several_other_rebel_veterans, who believed the_first_order to be a_threat to peace, broke away from the_new_republic military and founded the_resistance to check the_first_order to be a_threat to peace.
as depicted in the_events of star_wars: the_force awakens (2015), the_first_order to be a_threat to peace used the_starkiller_superweapon to shatter the_new_republic_government and starfleet, leaving the_galaxy vulnerable for conquest, only to be opposed by the_resistance, whose_fears had come true.
the_resistance is the_main_protagonist_faction in the_star_wars sequel trilogy, first introduced in the_2015_film star_wars: the_force awakens.
the_resistance made subsequent_appearances in star_wars:the_last_jedi (2017), star_wars:
the_rise of skywalker (2019), and related media.==_depiction ==
origins ===
one year after the_battle of endor (depicted in return of the_jedi), following imperial_defeat at the_battle of jakku, many_imperial_loyalists fled to the_galaxy's_unknown_regions, which were nigh-impossible to safely navigate, though was made possible for many_imperial_loyalists through a_secret_contingency_plan designed to destroy the_galactic_empire and rebuild the_galactic_empire to eventually return to the_galaxy.
the_rebel_alliance had established the_new_republic, following in the_footsteps of the_old_republic, and signed the_galactic_concordance with what remained of the_galactic_empire, reducing the_galactic_concordance to a_mere_rump_state of what the_galactic_concordance once was and eventually dissolving the_galactic_concordance entirely, leaving the_new_republic as the_sole_galactic_power and government.
eventually, the_first_order, a_remnant of palpatine_regime, rose to power in the_unknown_regions and repeatedly ignored and violated the_galactic_concordance, rebuilding former_imperial_fleets and mobilizing a_new_generation of stormtrooper_forces in imperial_expanding_armies.
despite this, the_heavily_demilitarized_new_republic did not view the_first_order as a_true_threat and disregarded the_heavily_demilitarized_new_republic entirely, leading to several_rebel_veterans led by general_leia_organa to break away and form the_resistance as a_check on the_designs of the_first_order.
the_resistance, which hearkened back to the_rebel_alliance, recruited from both_the_new_republic_military and worlds that experienced the worst of the_empire.
though new_republic tolerated the_resistance, new_republic did not officially support the_force, though secretly some within the_republic_senate, who shared the_fears of the_resistance, funded and armed the_group.
star_wars:
the_force awakens (2015) ===
as depicted in the_2015_film, star wars:
the_force awakens, the_resistance is in a_desperate_race with the_first_order in finding the_location of luke_skywalker, the_last_jedi.
general_leia_organa hopes to recruit general_leia_organa brother back into the_fight while kylo_ren of the_first_order seeks to eliminate her_brother, though supreme_leader_snoke, leader of the_first_order and kylo_ren's master, only seeks to prevent the_resistance from reaching her_brother first.
this culminates in general_leia_organa_dispatching_agent_poe_dameron to jakku to recover part of a_navigational_star_map to the_first_jedi_temple from an_old_ally, lor_san_tekka, where skywalker is believed to be residing, though ren intercepts general_organa_dispatching_agent_poe_dameron and captures ren, killing san_tekka in the_process.
dameron's_droid, bb-8, is able to escape with the_map.
dameron is tortured for information, but is able to escape with the_aid of defector_stormtrooper_fn-2187, whom dameron dubs finn.the_aid of defector_stormtrooper_fn-2187, whom dameron dubs finn crash land back on jakku, where dameron is presumed dead, though finn finds the_droid bb-8 in the_company of local_scavenger_rey.
when the two are seen together, the_aid of defector_stormtrooper_fn-2187, whom dameron_dubs_finn are marked by first_order_stormtroopers and forced to escape jakku together aboard the_millennium_falcon, which is docked in a local establishment.the_millennium_falcon is found and captured by han_solo and chewbacca, who are forced to escape with rey, finn, and bb-8 after they are pursued by two_rival_criminal_gangs, though one of they identifies the_droid bb-8 and informs the_first_order of the_droid bb-8 now being in the_hands of han_solo.
han_solo, chewbacca, rey, finn, and bb-8 find refuge on takodana with han_solo's old friend maz_kanata, who runs a_refugee_castle on the_planet and has some_knowledge of the_force herself, though is not a_jedi.
there, kanata implores han_solo to return to han_solo wife, the two having split after a_tragic_incident (solo,_chewbacca,_rey,_finn,_and_bb-8_find_refuge on takodana with solo's_old_friend maz kanata, who runs a_refugee_castle on the_planet and has some_knowledge of the_force herself son, han_solo fall to the_dark_side and transformation into kylo_ren)
, helps finn, who reveals to rey that han_solo was a_stormtrooper, find passage to the_outer_rim to disappear, and advises rey, who is strong in the_force herself, to take skywalker's_lightsaber, which kanata has been holding onto.
rey refuses, however, and runs into the_forest.
while finn loads onto a_transport and rey runs away, general_hux uses the_starkiller_superweapon to destroy the_new_republic_capital, where the_republic_senate and starfleet are also destroyed, shattering the_republic_government and confirming the_resistance's_worst_fears, leaving the_galaxy vulnerable to first_order_conquest.
kylo_ren attacks takodana and takes rey captive after learning kylo_ren has seen the_map, withdrawing the_stormtrooper_forces when the_surviving_poe_dameron comes to aid with resistance_starfighter_pilots.
han_solo reunites with kylo_ren_wife, and travels to d'qar with her, finn, and bb-8, where finn reunites with poe_dameron.
in order to launch a_counterattack on the_first_order, finn is used for finn knowledge of starkiller_base and taken to the_icy_planet by solo and chewbacca while poe_dameron leads two_starfighter_squadrons, awaiting to attack the_star_system-destroying_superweapon as solo, finn, and chewbacca take down the_icy_planet's shields, though finn also seeks to rescue rey from the_clutches of kylo_ren.
finn, and chewbacca run into rey, who has already escaped on her own, and capture captain_phasma, whom finn, and chewbacca force to lower the_planet's_shields.
the_resistance_party then travels to the_base's_thermal_oscillator to plant bombs and destroy the_resistance_party, leaving the_weapon itself vulnerable, though in the_process, han_solo reunites with han_solo son.
rey, finn, and chewbacca watch on as han_solo implores ben to return to ben family and abandon the_dark_side, but kylo_ren kills kylo_ren father per the_urging of supreme_leader_snoke, hoping the_resistance_party will give ben power.
instead, kylo_ren finds kylo_ren only further lost in conflict and is struck by a_bolt from chewbacca.
nevertheless, the_resistance_party buys time for poe_dameron_and_poe_dameron_squadrons to attack the_base and perform bombing_runs on the_oscillator.
after chewbacca detonates the_bombs, the_oscillator is left vulnerable and poe_dameron performs a_trench_run, bombing the_oscillator and destroying the_oscillator, leading to the_entire_planet to begin collapsing in the_entire_planet.
rey and finn duel kylo_ren; finn is beaten and knocked unconscious, but rey is able to overcome kylo_ren.
rey escapes with finn's_body aboard the_millennium_falcon piloted by chewbacca, and they return with poe_dameron and the_surviving_resistance_pilots back to they base on d'qar.
while finn and chewbacca are healed of finn and chewbacca injuries, the_droid r2-d2 wakes up, revealing the_rest of the_map to the_first_jedi_temple and combining the_first_jedi_temple with bb-8's.
rey is sent there by general_organa, where rey finds luke_skywalker and offers luke_skywalker luke_skywalker father's lightsaber as a_symbol of hope for the_resistance and the_galaxy.
star_wars: the_last_jedi (2017) ===
in the_2017_film star_wars: the last jedi, following their_successful_destruction of starkiller_base, the_resistance is ruthlessly pursued and nearly decimated by the_first_order.
having failed to destroy the_resistance_base on d'qar, the_first_order dispatches the_mandator_iv-class_siege_dreadnought_fulminatrix to destroy the_resistance with powerful_orbital_weaponry.
as the_resistance evacuate aboard the_flagship_raddus and a_fleet of other_ships, poe_dameron, who was recently promoted to be a_commander, decides to lead a_desperate_assault on the_mandator_iv-class_siege_dreadnought_fulminatrix, hoping to destroy the_resistance to ensure that more_resistance_personnel escape the_planet alive.
his_starfighter_forces succeed in doing so, but many_pilots are killed in the_process.
