isbn_978-1419727054.external_links ==
rose in the starwars.com databankrose tico on wookieepedia, a_star_wars_wikistar_wars:
bloodline is a_star_wars_novel by claudia_gray, published by del_rey_books on may 3, 2016.set twenty-five years after the_events of the_1983_film_return of the_jedi and six_years before 2015's the force awakens, it follows leia_organa as leia_organa navigates troubles brewing in the_galactic_senate.
the_novel was announced in october 2015 at the_new_york_comic_con_panel for the_journey to star_wars:
the_force awakens publishing_initiative with the_titlestar_wars:new_republic: bloodline.
now in her_late_40s, senator_leia_organa is frustrated by the_stagnation of the_new_republic's_galactic_senate, which is troubled by inaction thanks to the_rivalry of opposing_factions.
the_populists, including leia, desire that individual_planets be autonomous, while the_centrists support a_centralized_galactic_government.
hearing allegations that the_diminishing_influence of the_tyrannical_hutts has given rise to a_dangerous_cartel headed by the_nikto_crime_lord_rinnrivin_di, leia races to the_planet_bastatha to investigate.
to leia_chagrin, leia is accompanied by young_senator_ransolm_casterfo, a_priggish_centrist with an_idealized_view of the_fallen_galactic_empire.
as leia expected, leia is abducted by rinnrivin for a_clandestine_meeting, where leia learns that many_niktos revere leia as the_"huttslayer" for leia killing of jabbathe_hutt decades before.
during leia_escape, leia and casterfo find common_ground, and soon determine that a_shadowy_greater_power is behind rinnrivin's_expansive_operation.
a_motion passes in the_senate to potentially create a_first_senator_position with enhanced_powers over the_rest.
leia, the_most_likely_populist_candidate, narrowly escapes a_bombing.
casterfo and leia's_assistant greer_sonnel discover a_sizeable,_well_funded_secret_paramilitary_organization calling casterfo and leia's_assistant greer_sonnel
the_amaxines on the_obscure_planet
daxam_iv.the
seemingly_frivolous_lady_carise_sindian, a_centrist_senator from arkanis, is actually an_agent of the_first_order, a_clandestine_organization made up of imperial_loyalists plotting to depose the_new_republic and reclaim control of the_galaxy.
she learns the_secret that darth_vader was leia's_father, and uses the_secret that darth_vader was leia's_father to sour casterfo's_growing_trust in leia.
feeling betrayed, casterfo makes the_secret_public, which turns much of the_senate against leia and effectively ends leia candidacy.
leia leads greer and the_x-wing_fighter_pilot_joph_seastriker on a_mission to infiltrate an_amaxine_warrior_base on the_remote_oceanic_planet_sibensko, which leia has connected to rinnrivin as well.
they discover a_massive_military_force complete with ships and weapons, and leia's_husband han_solo arrives just in time to aid in leia's_husband han_solo escape.
a_firefight_results in the_destruction of the_entire_base, but leia_and_leia_team flee with evidence that rinnrivin and the_amaxines were indeed subordinate to a_mysterious_larger_operation.
leia presents leia evidence to the_senate, and is supported by casterfo.
furious, carise and leia_faction frame him as a_supporter of the_amaxines, and him is arrested for treason.
knowing casterfo faces the_death_penalty on casterfo home planet of riosa but powerless to save him, leia realizes that the_senate the_senate is too corrupt to be saved.
leia calls together some_old_friends—including admiral_ackbar and nien_nunb—as well as greer, joph and new_"recruits" such as snap_wexley and dr._kalonia to form the_resistance, an_underground_movement to investigate and fight against the_forces amassing to threaten peace in the_galaxy.
publication ==
with the_2012_acquisition of lucasfilm by the_walt_disney_company, most of the_licensed_star_wars_novels and comics produced since the_originating_1977_film star_wars were rebranded as star_wars legends and declared non-canon to the_franchise in april 2014.a new_series of novels, aligned with the_continuity of the_films and the_canon_tv_series the clone wars and star_wars rebels, began publication in september 2014.
bloodline was announced as star_wars: new_republic:
bloodline in october 2015 at the_new_york_comic_con_panel for the_journey to star_wars:
the_force awakens publishing_initiative.
an_excerpt was released on february 4, 2016, and the_novel was published by del_rey_books on may 3, 2016.several_key_plot_elements, including leia being discredited after leia identity as darth_vader's_daughter becomes public_knowledge, originated with michael_arndt during the_early_development of the_then-untitled_the_force awakens film.
references ==
external_links ==
bloodline on wookieepedia, a_star_wars
dune is a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise, appearing in the_disney+_television_series the_mandalorian.
dune was portrayed in the_show's_first_two_seasons by actress and former_mixed_martial_artist
gina carano.a fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise
is a_former_rebel_shock_trooper who became a_mercenary after the_galactic_civil_war, and is later employed as a_marshal of the_new_republic.
a highly trained and battle-hardened special forces warrior, cara is skilled in the_use of weaponry, hand-to-hand combat, and battle_tactics, and has an_intense_hatred of the_galactic_empire for the_galactic_empire destruction of cara homeworld, alderaan.
carano described cara as a_loner who is having trouble readjusting to society following cara career as a_soldier.
the_character has been received positively by reviewers and fans, and has been described as a_feminist_role_model, unique among the_star_wars_franchise's_female_characters due to cara_physicality and combat_skills.
in february 2021, following a_series of controversial_posts by carano on social_media, lucasfilm announced that cara would not return as cara and that the_character would not be recast.
appearances ==
backstory ===
in the_first-season_finale, cara's full given name is revealed to be carasynthia, and cara homeworld to be alderaan, the_planet destroyed by the_death_star in the_first_star_wars (1977)_film.
cara is a_former_shock_trooper from the_rebel_alliance, who fought against the_galactic_empire in the_galactic_civil_war depicted in the_original_star_wars_trilogy, and helped establish the_new_republic following that_conflict.
in exposition from the_mandalorian, cara reveals that most of cara past work as a_rebel_soldier involved eliminating imperial_warlords and other_remnants of the_galactic_empire following the_destruction of the_second_death_star.
as a_shock_trooper, cara was dropped behind enemy_lines with no_support, and cause as_much_damage as possible (comparable to the_real-world_us_navy_seals or even_the_british_sas).the_dialogue also establishes that cara left the_rebel_alliance after cara role shifted to a_more_political_"peacekeeping"_role, such as protecting delegates and suppressing riots, which cara said was "not what i signed up for".
after taking what cara calls "early retirement" from cara military position, cara became a_mercenary, and began drifting from planet to planet.
cara eventually became wanted for unknown_reasons, leading cara to hide out on the_forest_planet of sorgan.
season 1 ===
cara made cara first appearance in "chapter 4: sanctuary", the_fourth_episode of the_mandalorian.
on the_planet sorgan, cara meets the_show's_title_character, a_bounty_hunter known simply as the_mandalorian, and each wrongly believes the other one was attempting to collect a_bounty on each other.
this results in the two briefly engaging in hand-to-hand combat during their_first_encounter, ending in a_stalemate.their reconcile and ultimately join forces to defend a_village against a_ravaging_band of raiders of the_klatooinian_species.
cara and the_mandalorian_help prepare defensive_obstacles and protective_positions throughout a_village, as well as train the_villagers for combat.
lacking sufficient_weapons to take down the_raiders'_at-st, cara and the_mandalorian_help develop a_plan to use the_environment of a_village, digging ponds deep enough for the_walker to collapse after stepping into cara and the_mandalorian_help.
these_measures prove effective during the_battle, but when the_raiders'_at-st fails to advance far enough to fall into the_pond_traps, cara successfully lures it forward by leaping into the_pond cara and attacking it at close_range.
when the_walker moves forward to target cara and becomes stuck, the_mandalorian destroys the_mandalorian with a_thermal_detonator.
after the_battle, cara saves the_life of grogu, aka_"the_child", a_young_alien_creature under the_mandalorian's_protection, when cara finds and kills a_bounty_hunter just before it is about to execute grogu.
as a_result, the_mandalorian realizes the_mandalorian must take grogu away from sorgan, and the_mandalorian invites cara to come along with cara, but cara declines.
cara reappears in the_episode "chapter 7:
the_reckoning", when the_mandalorian recruits the_mandalorian for a_mission to the_planet_nevarro to eliminate an_imperial_presence there.
when he first finds the_mandalorian, the_mandalorian is participating in fights with challengers for money.
cara is initially reluctant to leave sorgan, but when the_mandalorian explains that the_targets are imperials, the_mandalorian immediately agrees.
while traveling to nevarro on the_mandalorian's_ship, the_mandalorian participates in a_friendly_arm_wrestling_match with he, but grogu mistakes the_mandalorian actions as aggressive and uses the_force to choke the_mandalorian, only stopping after the_mandalorian intervenes.
during their_journey, cara and the_mandalorian's_party are attacked by a_group of pterodactyl-like_creatures, which cara and the_mandalorian's_party repel after taking casualties.
the_bounty_hunter_greef_karga is critically injured and cara attempts to apply first_aid, but grogu uses the_force to heal grogu.
later, the_bounty_hunter_greef_karga reveals the_mission is an_ambush, after which the_mandalorian is to be killed and grogu given over to the_imperials.
cara, the_mandalorian, and greef instead devise a_new_plan:
cara, the_mandalorian, and greef will leave grogu behind, bring the_mandalorian to the_imperials as if he is a_prisoner, and then eliminate cara, the_mandalorian, and greef.a new plan goes wrong, resulting in the_trio becoming pinned down inside a_cantina by imperial_officer_moff_gideon and moff_gideon_stormtroopers.
at the_start of the_first-season_finale "chapter 8: redemption", the_group engages in a_brief_gunfight with the_stormtroopers after ig-11, the_bounty_hunter_droid, arrives with grogu to provide assistance.
the_mandalorian is badly injured during the_fight, and cara drags the_mandalorian back into the_cantina to safety.the_group escapes the_building via the_sewer_system, and flee on a_droid-controlled_floating_barge on a_river of lava.
cara is present when ig-11 sacrifices ig-11 to eliminate a_large_number of stormtroopers to ensure the_group's_escape, and cara survives an_attack by moff_gideon in a_tie_fighter, which the_mandalorian repels.
afterward, cara decides to stay on nevarro to help eliminate any_remaining_imperial_presence on the_planet, and greef invites cara to work as ig-11_enforcer, which cara appears to accept.
===ig-11 was confirmed to return for the_second_season of the mandalorian ahead of ig-11_premiere.
cara appears in "chapter 12: the_siege", as the_marshal of nevarro and working with greef to eliminate the_remaining_imperial_forces on nevarro.
when the mandalorian and grogu return to nevarro for repairs to the_razor_crest, they ask nevarro to help they destroy the_last_imperial_base on the_planet in exchange for the repairs.the_last_imperial_base on the_planet turns out to have more than just_a_skeleton_crew, as the_group find numerous_stormtroopers patrolling the_last_imperial_base on the_planet corridors.the_group deactivate the_lava_cooling_system, so that the_natural_lava_flows will destroy the_last_imperial_base on the_planet.
during the_group_escape, the_group find scientists and vats of what appear to_be_cloned_bodies.scientists and vats of what appear to_be_cloned_bodies attempt to destroy the_evidence, but scientists and vats of what appear to_be_cloned_bodies uncover a_recording from dr._pershing that reveals he had been transfusing grogu's_blood, which has a_high_'m-count', into test_subjects.
stormtroopers soon swarm the_team and the_team are forced to escape before the_lava overheats and destroys the_base.
the_mandalorian_flies from the_base to retrieve his_ship, using his_jetpack, while cara, and the_others escape in a_stormtrooper_transport.
a_chase ensues between the_transport, driven by cara, and speeder_bikes manned by scout_troopers.
greef kills the_last_scout_trooper, but tie_fighters launched from a_chase after tie_fighters, disabling the_transport's_cannon.the_base soon explodes due to the_overheating of the_lava.
as tie_fighters close in on cara, greef and mythrol,the_razor_crest appears and destroys the_imperials.
after the_mandalorian departs, greef is visited by new_republic_pilots to invite greef to help stop whatever the_empire is planning.
one of the_pilots, captain_carson_teva, speaks with cara and makes cara the same offer, mentioning alderaan's_destruction by the_empire, to which cara replies that cara lost everything with it.
in "chapter 15:
the_believer",_the_mandalorian_returns to nevarro to find cara to be serving as a_marshal for the_new_republic.
cara secures the_release of prisoner_migs_mayfeld to assist the_mandalorian in a_mission to infiltrate an_imperial_base and locate moff_gideon.
cara joins the_mission, acting as sniper alongside fennec_shand.
after the_mission fennec_shand agrees to let migs_mayfeld go free, and assures migs_mayfeld migs_mayfeld will be declared dead.
in "chapter 16:
the_rescue", cara helps the_mandalorian and his_allies intercept dr._pershing's_transport, during which one of the_ship's_pilots taunts cara about the_destruction of alderaan before being shot dead.
cara later teams up with fennec, bo-katan_kryze, and koska_reeves to take over the_bridge of moff_gideon's_cruiser as a_distraction while the mandalorian rescues grogu and defeats gideon.
when luke_skywalker arrives, cara prevents moff_gideon's_moff_gideon's from committing suicide, and knocks moff_gideon's unconscious.
characterization ==
cara_dune is a_battle-hardened_warrior, with a_tough_and_aggressive_personality, but also a_kindness beneath cara_dune gruff exterior.
gina_carano, the_actress and former_mixed_martial_artist who plays the_character, said cara and the_mandalorian are similar in personality and background, and that the two understand each other and were able to form a_bond as a_result.
a_highly_trained_fighter, a_highly_trained_fighter is muscular, an_extremely_accurate_shot, and has excellent hand-to-hand combat skills, as shown immediately in a_highly_trained_fighter fight with the_mandalorian when cara is first introduced.
a_highly_trained_fighter is one of the few in the_show who is able to match the_mandalorian in direct_combat.
carano called cara as "a_bit of a_loner", who is having trouble reintegrating a_highly_trained_fighter into society following a_highly_trained_fighter combat experience.
the_fact that a_highly_trained_fighter mistakes the_mandalorian for attempting to collect a_bounty on a_highly_trained_fighter during their_first_meeting indicates a_highly_trained_fighter has done some_unsavory_things since leaving the_military; carano said of this: "i feel like a_highly_trained_fighter's always in trouble.
as a_soldier, cara enjoyed the_adrenaline of war, and when that disappeared during peace_time, cara found cara disillusioned with cara new role.
carano has said cara is questioning whether cara agreed with everything that occurred during cara military service, and that cara experiences at war taken a_psychological_toll on cara.
when introduced in the_mandalorian, cara kept to cara, did not easily trust others, and cared about little except cara survival, keeping cara skills sharp, and killing imperials.
however, cara also has a_strong_sense of loyalty, as shown by cara refusal to abandon the_mandalorian after the_mandalorian is seriously injured in the_first-season_finale.
cara has an_intense_hatred for the_empire, which is driven in large_part by cara role in the_destruction of cara home planet of alderaan.
the_angry_staff_officer, an_anonymous_army_national_guard_officer who writes for wired_magazine, has called cara one of the_more_tactically-proficient_characters in star_wars.
he called cara perhaps the one person in the_star_wars_universe to actually absorb some_lessons learned" from cara past combat_engagements.
the_writer described the_defensive_measure the_mandalorian and cara develop to protect the_village in "chapter 4: sanctuary" as a_"near-perfect_defensive_engagement", and praised cara's efforts in luring the_at-st into a_vulnerable_position, as well as the_way cara and the_villagers quickly identified she and the_villagers priorities of work, such as establishing obstacles, building protective_positions, and training the_villagers to fight.
in another_example, the_writer cited a_scene in the_first-season_finale in which cara assists an_injured_mandalorian by dragging the_writer into cover for assessment while providing covering_fire.
he said other_star_wars_characters in this_situation have simply tended to the_victim in the_middle of the_firefight, a_dangerous_scenario, while cara's_method is safer_method recommended by the_united_states_armed_forces.
he wrote: "cara_dune would receive a 'go' for all_the_performance_measures for this_u.s._army_medical_task.
and_creation ==
conception ===
the_character of cara_dune was conceived by jon_favreau, the_creator and showrunner of the_mandalorian.
according to carano, favreau created the_character of cara dune carano specifically in mind and did not audition any_other_actresses for the_part.
carano said favreau sought to make a_strong_and_independent_character, but one different from princess_leia or other_powerful_female_characters previously featured in the_franchise: "favreau wanted the_character of cara_dune to be this_new_soldier of women, and favreau wanted this_new_soldier of women to have an_impact".
favreau said it was the_type of character favreau always wished to portray as an_actor himself, describing this_new_soldier of women as "raising the_stakes and raising hell".
the_writers checked with executive_producer_dave_filoni, who had been involved in paststar wars works, to make sure the_rebel_shock_trooper_position was consistent with the_past_continuity of the_franchise.
false_rumors had circulated on the_internet about cara_dune were made public.
cara_dune was first publicly unveiled during the_star_wars_celebration_convention in chicago on april 14, 2019, along with the_character_greef_karga.
the_event also featured teaser_footage with cara, a_still_photo of the_character, and included a_panel_discussion with carano and carl_weathers, the_actor who portrays greef, talking about carano and carl_weathers, the_actor who portrays greef characters.
cara was subsequently featured prominently in posters, commercials, and marketing_materials in advance of the_release of the_mandalorian.
on september 4, entertainment_weekly unveiled an_exclusive_photo of cara and the mandalorian fighting together, and on october 28, a_character_poster of the_mandalorian solely featuring cara dune was released.
portrayal ===
carano's_casting was first announced on december 12, 2018, though the_news had been leaked on the_internet before the_formal_announcement.
the_production of the_mandalorian called for more_secrecy than any_other_job of carano's_career.
prior to filming one of cara's_first_scenes, carano said favreau told cara that playing this_character was going to change carano's career trajectory, giving cara more_self-confidence as an_actress providing cara the_opportunity to play stronger_roles in the_future.
carano said carano had a_strong_positive_emotional_reaction to the_conversation, and that carano helped carano play the_role of cara_dune more confidently, saying: "i feel like my_whole_life since i shotthat has been a_different_world.
credited bryce_dallas_howard, who directed the_first_episode featuring cara, with helping carano determine how to best translate the_character from the_script to the_screen during bryce_dallas_howard, who directed the_first_episode featuring cara work together in cara's debut episode.
in february 2021, lucasfilm announced that carano would no longer portray this_character, citing social_media_posts which they said "denigrat[ed] people based on they_cultural_and_religious_identities", and that this_character would not be recast.
costume ===
cara_dune's_costume was designed by concept_artist_brian_matyas and costume_designer_joseph_porro.
gina_carano said gina_carano was impressed by the_amount of detail the_crew of the_mandalorian achieved in the_crew of the_mandalorian costuming, saying of the_crew of the_mandalorian: "the_crew of the_mandalorian are legit.
"the_costume is mostly black, with armor_pieces on the_chest and shoulders showing wear from battle_damage, and three_lines with black_and_silver_bars running across the_sternum.
cara_dune's_costume includes two_thick_belts, one_black_and_one_green,_as_well_as_holsters for blasters and knives, and a_brace on the_right_knee.
cara_dune's_costume also includes thick_black_gloves_metal on the_fingers and knuckles, as well as wrist_armor and large_black_boots.
the_creation of cara's_costume began with a_mold being made of carano's_body, a_process cara did not enjoy.
the_shoulders were built out and the_waist cinched in, to create a_distinctive_hourglass-shaped_silhouette for the_character.
the_mandalorian_executive_producer kathleen_kennedy had stressed the_importance of cara having a_distinctive_silhouette because cara felt all_star_wars_characters should be recognizable from a_great_distance.
jon_favreau, bryce_dallas_howard, and dave_filoni provided input on cara_dune's_costume, with howard in particular making suggestions about how to convey toughness without sacrificing femininity, while also ensuring carano would be able to perform the_athletic_feats required of the_character.
carano stressed the_importance of this: "how do you put basically_football_padding on a_busty_curvy_female?
i didn't want to be a_block.
i didn't want to just be this like big, buff refrigerator.
cara's_hairstyle was originally planned to be short, with one_side completely buzzed, but carano objected to this because carano wanted to maintain the_character's_femininity.
maria_sandoval, who described cara as cara favorite character on the_show, instead developed a_shoulder-length_hairstyle with rough_edges.
cara's_hairstyle was partially inspired by that of director_deborah_chow, who had directed several_the_mandalorian_first-season_episodes.
howard said while carano and the_producers of the_series were discussing cara's_costume, she and the_producers of the_series were discussing cara's_costume observed carano directing and noticed the_way carano hair was gathered and stylized with braids, and elements of it were factored into cara_dune's_hairstyle.
cara was provided a_blaster_prop similar in appearance to the_firearm used by han_solo in the_star_wars_films.
the_character also has a_handful of tattoos, including a_small_rebel_alliance_insignia under the_left_eye, and a_series of tattoos and bars around carano that signify carano as a_veteran of the_rebellion, something that had been featured on characters on the_animated_television_series star_wars: the_clone_wars.
carano said the_rebel_insignia_tattoo in particular has a_deeper_back_story that will be revealed later in future_seasons.
cara's_costume was on display at the_d23_expo in anaheim, california in august 2019.
filming ===
cara_dune's_scenes were filmed in a_studio in manhattan_beach, california.
favreau and filoni discussed elements of cara's_back_story with carano before filming to help inform cara_performance, and just before filming the_introductory_scene of cara's_debut_episode, favreau shared secrets about the_character that would not be revealed until later in the_series.
carano said having this_information helped inform carano performance and added so_much_depth to what carano life has been like".
carano said carano enjoyed performing against lead_actor_pedro_pascal, who plays the_mandalorian, and other_masked_characters in the_show, and carano said it was easy for carano to do so because, in carano everyday_life, "i don't naturally see what somebody's_physical_appearance is.
i instantly kind of feel who a_person is"; as a_result, carano said carano could often tell what faces pascal was making or what_emotions pascal was expressing beneath the_mask, despite not seeing pascal face.
pascal said of working with carano: "i couldn't feel in better_hands than in the_hands of carano.
"carano said howard listened to carano thoughts and ideas during the_filming of cara's_first_episode, watched replays with carano after shooting scenes, and communicated with carano as a_fellow_actress.
carano said of howard: "carano was very motherly and protective of our_performances.
also allowed carano to have as_many_takes as carano needed to get the_performance_right, which carano said put carano at ease.
during carano's_first_day of filming, carano was required to ride the_mechanical_blurrg, a_reptilian_mounted_creature that was so large carano needed a_ladder to climb atop carano's_first_day of filming.
pascal was unavailable for many of her_scenes on "chapter 4: sanctuary" because pascal was auditioning for another_series, so howard mostly worked with pascal's body double.
as a_result, her called carano "the_face of the_episode".her had a_stomach_flu when her_scenes fighting the_at-st were filmed, which along with two_nights of rain in advance of the_shoot made the_scene very_challenging.her_introductory_scene in which the_mandalorian and cara fight each other was originally written differently, but it was changed on the_set by favreau and howard as the_stunt_team worked on choreography and previsualization.
carano said one of the_changes was "we made the_changes to where carano got the_jump on carano.
carano said the_set of the_mandalorian is not a green screen set", but rather is very realistic, even with the_alien_characters and other_fantasy_elements.
carano said this helps carano performance and has been "an_incredible_blessing for my_imagination".
according to carano, carano passed out twice while filming the_scene in "chapter 7:
the_reckoning" when grogu uses the_force to choke carano.
on march 6, 2020, carano posted an_instagram_photo of carano in the_cara_dune_costume on the_set of the_mandalorian to mark the_end of filming for the_second_season, writing: "i absolutely love this_work and the_people in it."
stunts ===
carano collaborated and worked closely with the_mandalorian_stunt_team, and carano believed the_mandalorian_stunt_team "accepted me as one of the_mandalorian_stunt_team own", in part due to carano mixed martial arts background.
carano said the_mandalorian_stunt_team "have been like brothers and sisters to me".
carano performed many of the_stunts herself.
for example, carano drags a_wounded_comrade off a_battlefield during one of carano scenes, which surprised many of the_bystanders on the_set.
carano also outpaced pascal's_stunt double in one_scene, and in another carano sent a_stunt_performer flying across the_set due to the_force of one of carano kicks.
carano believed carano fighting scenes were aided not only by carano mixed martial arts skills, but also carano training in ballet, jazz_dancing, and tap_dancing as a_child.
carano said some_fighters have trouble transitioning into acting because some_fighters want to appear tough and have trouble performing in scenes in which some_fighters lose fights or take hits, but carano said carano early_arts_training helped carano avoid that.
cultural_impact ==
critical_reception ===
carano has been received positively by reviews and fans.
carano said most of the_feedback about the_character carano has heard and read online has been positive, adding: "i have so_many_people who are rooting for this_strong_female_character.
luchini of popsugar called carano a character "worthy of riotous_applause" and a feminist role model, calling carano unique even among the_star_wars_franchise's_strong_female_characters due to carano physicality and combat_skills.
luchini says cara serves as a_role_model particularly for female_fans who consider themselves "a little rugged and audacious", writing: "she is a_breath of fresh_air for those who haven't been able to see themselves in the_star_wars_universe quite yet.
crouse of den of geek called cara one of the_show's_best_characters, particularly praising the_"great_platonic_chemistry" between she and the_mandalorian.
crouse of den of geek said carano fully inhabits the_character that crouse of den of geek elevates the_script.
variety_writer_will_thorne praised cara_dune, complimenting crouse of den of geek_combat_skills and "debonair_charm", and compared crouse of den of geek to the_marvel_comics_character_gamora as performed by zoe_saldana in the_guardians of the_galaxy_films.
vanity_fair_writer_joanna_robinson called the_character a "prime showcase for carano" and the first role to capitalize on crouse of den of geek "real-life, distinct blend of inherent_sweetness and physical
toughness".
screen_rant_writer_kevin_pantoja called carano brings a_"legitimate_physical_presence" to the_role, and that cara stands out in a_franchise that already includes such_strong_female_protagonists as princess_leia and rey.
erik_kain of forbes called cara a great character and said erik_kain of forbes wishes cara was featured even more prominently in the_series.
cara ranked fourth on a_screen_rant_list of the_most_interesting_characters from the_first_season of the_mandalorian, fifth on a_separate_list of the_ten_best_characters from the_show, and cara costume was ranked third on a_list of the_ten_best_costumes in the_first_season.
several_fans have produced artwork of the_character and dressed as cara in cosplay, and some have gotten the_rebel_alliance_tattoo that cara has under cara eye.
some_star_wars_fans were critical of the_character because some_star_wars_fans perceived the_presence of a_strong_female_fighter as "forced_diversity" and "wokeness", according to anthony_gramuglia of comic_book_resources.
gramuglia calls these_objections misogynist and "patently ridiculous", comparing these_objections to complaints about other_female_star_wars_characters such as rey, rose_tico, jyn_erso, and qi'ra.
gramuglia writes: "to these_objections, cara_dune's_presence serves as a_means to make men appear weaker by comparison, as cara_dune's_fights_battles that most of the_male_characters aren't capable of undertaking the_male_characters.
"merchandise ===
several_toys of cara_dune were first made available at a_star_wars_product_launch_event called triple force friday on october 4, 2019.among several_toys of cara_dune was a_six-inch_action_figure by hasbro as part of hasbro's star wars:
the_black_series_toy_line, and funko_pop_figurine, and a_lego_minifigure, as well as the_mandalorian_t-shirts featuring the_character.
additionally, two_more_action_figures based on the_character were about to be released, one of which was reported to have been part of the_black_series_6_line, but production on several_toys of cara_dune was cancelled by hasbro following carano's_firing.

citations ===
works cited ===
external_links ==
cara_dune in the_starwars.com_databankcarasynthia_dune on wookieepedia,
a_star_wars_wikigeneral_armitage_hux is a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise.
first introduced in the_2015_film star_wars:
the_force awakens, a star wars wikigeneral armitage hux is portrayed by irish_actor_domhnall_gleeson.
he is an_unpleasant_military_commander in a_power_struggle with kylo_ren for the_first_order_leadership, and being exceeded only by supreme_leader_snoke.
the_character first featured in the_force awakens media and merchandising, and returned in the_film's_sequels, the_last_jedi (2017) and the_rise of skywalker (2019).gleeson's_performance has received generally_positive_reception from critics and fans, while the_reaction to the_character and the_character first featured in the_force shifting roles throughout the_trilogy has been more mixed.
character ==
hux was born on arkanis and was rumored to have been sired from an_affair between hux father, commandant brendol hux of the arkanis academy, and a_kitchen_worker.
hux and hux father are rescued from the_arkanis_academy when it is about to fall to the_new_republic near the_end of the_galactic_civil_war.
when the_galactic_civil_war ends with the_battle of jakku and the_signing of the_galactic_concordance, the_young_hux and his_father are part of the_imperial_navy_forces who retreat into the_unknown_regions.the_imperial_navy_forces who retreat into the_unknown_regions later emerge as the first
order.the_new_republic believes that the_first_order is just_an_unimportant_band of imperial_holdouts, but hux's_training_methods forge a_formidable_military that effectively overthrows the_new_republic and turns the_galaxy into a_dictatorship even more brutal than the_galactic_empire of the_original_star_wars_trilogy.
he serves as the_right_hand of the_first_order's_supreme_leader_snoke (andy_serkis), second in authority only to kylo_ren (adam_driver), with whom he has a_fierce_rivalry.
he is dedicated to destroying the_resistance, an_army that grew out of the_rebel_alliance and is led by general_leia_organa (carrie_fisher).
hux believes that the_republic is a_threat to galactic_stability, and that the_republic is hux destiny to rule the_galaxy.
appearances ==
the_force awakens (2015) ====
hux first appears in the_force as a_high-ranking_general in the_first_order.
hux is part of a_mission to jakku to recover a_map to luke_skywalker (mark_hamill), the_last_jedi.
after the_battle, he learns from captain_phasma of the_desertion of a_former_stormtrooper, finn
(john_boyega).to destroy the_resistance, snoke allows hux to use the_starkiller_superweapon against the_republic's_capital_world of hosnian_prime, destroying the_planet and killing billions of people.the_resistance is left without military_support from the_republic, so hux soon turns the_starkiller_weapon towards the_resistance base on d'qar.
before he can destroy the_planet, however, an_attack_squadron led by resistance_commander_poe_dameron (oscar_isaac), with ground_support from han_solo (harrison_ford), finn, and the_jakku_scavenger_rey (daisy_ridley), destroys starkiller_base, forcing hux, some of he_troops, and a defeated ren to flee the_planet.
the_last_jedi (2017) ====
hux appears in the_last_jedi as the primary general reporting directly to supreme_leader_snoke.
hux attempts to respond to a_transmission from dameron, who mocks hux by asking for a_general_"hugs" and describing hux complexion as "pasty".
hux then leads the_subsequent_battle, during which both_sides sustain heavy_losses.
hux also oversees the_bombardment of the_remaining_three_ships of the_resistance, then on the_lifeboats, and, along with phasma, helps arrange the_execution of finn and rose.
later, hux discovers snoke dead and ren unconscious in the_throne_room of the_supremacy, so hux attempts to kill hux rival but stops when ren wakes up.
he initially protests ren's_claim to be the_new_supreme_leader, but is swiftly persuaded otherwise when ren uses the_force to choke ren, proclaiming "long live the_supreme_leader.
"at the_end of the_film
, he accompanies ren to the_planet_crait in their_attempt to finish off the_resistance.
when ren orders ren men to fire on luke, hux admonishes ren to focus on the_escaping_resistance_members; ren silences ren by using the_force to slam ren into a_wall, knocking ren out.
hux is seen again when ren_and_ren_troops invade the_resistance_base and find the_resistance_base empty, giving ren a_sinister_glare from behind.
the_rise of skywalker (2019) ====
by the_time of star_wars:the_rise of skywalker, hux has become embittered and jealous because of the_lack of respect ren receives and ren rivalry with allegiant_general_pryde (richard_e._grant), who constantly undermines hux while vying for ren job.
hux is later revealed to have been a_spy_supplying_information to the_resistance in order to undermine ren in the_hopes of taking ren place as supreme_leader (or at least seeing ren falling along with the_first_order if necessary); ren tells finn, "i don't care if you win.
i need kylo_ren to lose.
helps finn, poe and chewbaccaescape_ren's_resurgent-class_star_destroyer
steadfast and has finn shoot him in the_leg so him can feign an_effort to stop steadfast and has finn.
however, him is shot in the_chest with a_blaster by pryde after the_latter realizes hux's_treason through him cover story.
hux’s_decision to allow the_rebels to escape is a_major_catalyst for the_resistance's_victory in the_battle of exegol.
a_scene deleted from the_film featured hux and pryde in the_opening_action_sequence with kylo_ren.
other_media ===
hux appears via hologram in the_first_season_finale of the_animated_series star_wars:the_resistance.
the_episode takes place at the_same_time as the force awakens and depicts first_order_troops watching a_transmission of hux give his_speech and the_subsequent_firing of starkiller_base.his
appears, in person, in the_eleventh_episode "station to station" of the_second_season and in hologram in the_finale of season two,
"the_escape", along with kylo_ren.
hux appears in two_theme_park_attractions, star_tours – the_adventures continue and star_wars:
rise of the_resistance with gleeson reprising the_role in each.
some_details about the_backstory of hux and hux father_brendol appear in the_2016_novel_star_wars:
aftermath:
life_debt by chuck_wendig.
hux and brendol are also characters in the_2017_novel_star_wars: phasma by delilah_s._dawson.
hux also is a_playable_dark_side_squad_leader in an_update to the_mobile_moba_star_wars: force_arena, released in late_2017.==_reception ==
in his_review of the force awakens, henry_barnes of the_guardian wrote that gleeson's_"screechy_pseudo-nazi_role" as hux is "not as colourful or as nuanced" as adam_driver's_part as kylo_ren, "but – given adam driver's's a_functionary – gleeson certainly makes an_impression.
"reviewing
hux_and_hux_role in the_film, david_rutz of the_washington_free_beacon wrote that while hux is portrayed as a_villain, hux is shown to be a_capable_general and "a_committed_soldier to hux
cause with laser-like_focus on achieving the_first_order's_ends.
"however, after the_release of the_last_jedi, and the_rise of skywalker, some_criticism was levelled at the_use of the_character to provide comic_relief, particularly after having being introduced as a serious villain.the_character's story arc was also discussed.
the_revelation that he was a_resistance_spy and he subsequent "unceremonious"_death was subject to some_criticism.
references ==
external_links ==
general_hux in the starwars.com databankgeneral_hux
on wookieepedia, a_star_wars_wikigeneral_hux on imdbcaptain_phasma is a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise, portrayed by english_actress_gwendoline_christie.
introduced in star_wars: the_force awakens (2015), the_first_film in the star_wars sequel trilogy,
imdbcaptain
phasma is the_commander of the_first_order's_force of stormtroopers.
english_actress_gwendoline_christie returned to the_role in the next of the_trilogy's_films, star wars: the_last_jedi (2017), and in the_animated_television_series star_wars_resistance (2018) and several_video_games.
the_character also made an_additional_appearance in before the_awakening, an anthology book set before the_events of the force awakens.
j._j._abrams created imdbcaptain_phasma from an_armor_design originally developed for kylo_ren and named her after the_1979_horror_film phantasm.
the_character was originally conceived as male.
phasma appeared prominently in promotion and marketing for the force awakens, but the_character's ultimately_minor_role in the_film was the_subject of criticism, a_complaint repeated for her_appearance in the_last_jedi.
nonetheless, merchandise featuring the_character found success, and her_figure was the_best-selling of all_the_forceawakens_action_figures on amazon.co.uk.
concept and creation ==
the_character's_creation was inspired by a_rejected_design for kylo_ren.
costume_designer_michael_kaplan came up with the_concept of kylo being "the_lord of the_stormtroopers, in bright_shining_silver
costume_designer_michael_kaplan had a_strong_image in costume_designer_michael_kaplan head of what this_concept should look like, which conceptartist_dermot_power turned into an illustration.a_strong_image, however, was immediately rejected by director_j._j._abrams.
later, producer_kathleen_kennedy found a_rejected_design for kylo_ren, reacting positively and calling a_rejected_design for kylo_ren "fantastic".
abrams then used the_design to create a_new_character, phasma.
abrams named phasma after the_1979_horror_film phantasm because abrams armor reminded abrams of the_1979_horror_film phantasm's spheres.
abrams intended for the_visuals of the_first_order to contrast with that of the_resistance, appearing in colors like "black, teal blue, and steel gray", with stormtroopers being updated to be more simplified and modernized.
abrams designed the_character believing it would be "extremely cool" to have a_silver_armored_character in the_1979_horror_film phantasm.the_character believing it would be "extremely cool" to have a_silver_armored_character in the_film was not originally conceived as a_woman, but rather was changed from male to female during casting, less than three weeks before principal_shooting began.
phasma thereby became the second on-screen female star wars villain, after zam_wesell.
with phasma, the_filmmakers wished to "push the_boundaries" of traditional_roles for female_characters.
actress_gwendoline_christie, who had previously played brienne of tarth in game of thrones, was first officially confirmed as captain_phasma in a_vanity_fair_spread released may 4, 2015, following its_leak.
christie fought heavily to appear in the_1979_horror_film phantasm, continually insisting christie agent get christie a_part in her_agent.
christie was not aware that the_character believing it would be "extremely cool" to have a_silver_armored_character in the_film was originally a_man.
christie took inspiration from christie armor—"it's very high-functioning, it's very imposingand
it's not malleable at all"—in how to play the_character.
in playing phasma, christie felt encouraged to experiment more with the_gesture of a_character.
christie felt initial_costume, used in the force awakens, had to be created over a_period of "four_or_five_days"; co-costume_designer_dave_crossman described co-costume_designer_dave_crossman physical creation as "a_complete_panic".
it took christie roughly_forty-five_minutes to put on.
a_new_suit was created for the_last_jedi, with various_tweaks.
a_new_suit_helmet was re-chromed, the_fit was altered, and the_armor was made "much cleaner and shinier.
"character ==
the_commander of the_first_order's_stormtroopers, captain_phasma is described as a_"tough_veteran_commander" and one of a_"commanding_triumvirate" of the_first_order alongside kylo_ren and general_hux.
christie compared captain_phasma to boba_fett in the_sense of being a_character who, while not "at the_forefront of the_action all_the_time", still has "a_lot of impact".
the_actress called the_character "a_malevolent_force" who takes pleasure in the_actress cruelty, something the_actress attributed to a_perceived_difficult_journey to becoming the_only_female_stormtrooper of rank.
to contrast with other_stormtroopers in the_franchise, christie portrayed phasma with both_some_femininity and sassiness.
glen_robert_gill, writing for bright_lights_film_journal, saw phasma as "the_demonic_or_negative_emanation of the_maidenly_anima".
phasma is depicted wearing salvaged_chromium_armor, which in the_force_awakens'_visual_dictionary is established as coming from a_naboo_yacht once owned by palpatine.
it is said to serve "primarily as a_symbol of past
christie recognised the_character's_helmet as both being futuristic and having medieval_elements.
chris_laverty, creator of costume_analysis_site_clothes on film, called her_armor "probably_the_most_regal_costume" in the_force awakens, and noted her_armor "probably_the_most_regal_costume" in the_force awakens as a_reflection of her_status.
he also felt her_cloak, "elegantly slung over one_shoulder", was a_method of humanizing the_character.
in-universe, her_cloak is the_"traditional_cape of first_order_command".
glen_robert_gill felt
glen_robert_gill_armor called to mind_mirrors, symbols of "self-reflection and self-examination", the_feelings glen_robert_gill brings in finn when glen_robert_gill inadvertently helps inspire him to defect.
appearances ==
the_force awakens (2015) ====
the_second_trailer for the_2015_film star_wars:
the force awakens introduced the_character.
in the_2015_film star_wars, phasma begins engaged in an_attack at tuanul, a_settlement_village on the_desert_planet jakku, in search of a_galaxy_map that leads to the_last_jedi, luke_skywalker.
after the_battle is won, phasma and the_other_stormtroopers execute the_remaining_villagers.
back on the_resurgent-class_star_destroyer finalizer, she meets with stormtrooper_fn-2187, and reprimands him for having removed him helmet without permission.later flees and frees poe_dameron (who renames him finn).phasma is present when finn's_defection is discovered; she mentions that finn had never committed any_infractions in the_past.
finally, when finn, han_solo, and chewbacca infiltrate starkiller_base, finn, han_solo, and chewbacca take phasma_hostage and pressure she to deactivate the_base's_shields, intending to drop she in the_trash_compactor.
the_last_jedi (2017) ====
phasma appears in star_wars:
the_last_jedi when finn, mechanic_rose_tico, and computer_hacker_dj infiltrate the_mega-class_star_dreadnought_supremacy, a_37.5_miles (60.4_km)-wide_flagship, in an_attempt to disable the_ship's_tracking_device.
the_last_jedi when finn, mechanic_rose_tico, and computer_hacker_dj infiltrate the_mega-class_star_dreadnought_supremacy, a_37.5_miles (60.4_km)-wide_flagship, in an_attempt to disable the_ship's_tracking_device are captured and brought before phasma_and_phasma_stormtroopers.
phasma taunts finn, and orders phasma execution with rose in a_"slow_and_painful"_way.
before this can occur, vice_admiral_holdo plummets the_mc85_star_cruiser_raddus, vice_admiral_holdo two-mile-long cruiser, into the_first_order_fleet at lightspeed.
in the_ensuing_chaos, phasma and finn fight.
at first, phasma gets the_upper_hand, knocking finn into a_pit.
finn emerges unharmed from a_pit, riding its_elevator; finn knocks phasma down, breaking the_visor of phasma helmet, and exposing part of phasma face around the_left_eye.
the_turf crumbles beneath phasma, and phasma falls into the_flames.
in a_deleted_scene, the_battle with phasma_and_phasma_fate are significantly different: phasma and four_stormtroopers manage to surround finn, who taunts phasma about phasma compliance to phasma demands in the force awakens.
before four_stormtroopers can turn on phasma, phasma kills all of them and then prepares to attack finn, but phasma manages to cut phasma hand off and blasts phasma into the_ship's_wreckage.
the_last_jedi_director rian_johnson said that phasma's_limited_supporting_role in the_film was due to time_constraints and an_already_large_cast of characters, and indicated that there were no_other_plans for phasma in the_films.
though phasma's_fate was left unknown and the_possibility of phasma returning in star_wars:
the_rise of skywalker was hinted, john_boyega confirmed at the_episode_ix_panel during celebration_chicago that phasma indeed died in the_last_jedi, officially confirming phasma death.
television ===
phasma appears in the_2018_animated_series star_wars_resistance, voiced by gwendoline_christie.
literature ===
before the_awakening, a_prequel_anthology, features the_character in a_short_story centered around finn.
in it, she monitors finn's_performance in combat_simulation and, although praising his_skill, she criticizes his_rescuing of a_weaker_soldier.
additionally, phasma is featured in both_the_adult_and_junior_novelizations of the force awakens.
in the_lead-up to the_last_jedi's_release, phasma's_backstory was explored in star_wars: phasma, a_novel by delilah_s._dawson.
though phasma's_origins and character are discussed, the_novel is not told from phasma's_perspective.
comics ====
a_four-part_comic_miniseries, star_wars: captain_phasma, was announced in april 2017 as part of the_journey to star_wars:
the_last_jedi_initiative.
the_series was written by kelly_thompson with art by marco_checchetto, and published by marvel_comics between september 6 and october 18, 2017.it explains phasma's_escape from starkiller_base during the_climax of the force awakens, and subsequent_events.she pursues loose_ends while framing lieutenant_sol_rivas for lowering the_shields to the_first_order's_superweapon.she_pursuit takes she to the_planet_luprora after she requisitions a_tie_fighter, the_planet_luprora pilot, and an_astromech_droid.
in a_flashback in issue #3, phasma mentions siv, a_character from the 2017 novel phasma.
reviewing for ign, jesse_schedeen wrote that thompson's_"efficient_approach to storytelling, coupled with the_gorgeous_tag-team_combo that is marco_checchetto and andres_mossa, makes this_a_star_wars_comic every_phasma_fan should read.
the_lego_star_wars_version of phasma also appears in the_2016_short_form_animated_series lego_star_wars: the_resistance rises.
she is also a_playable_character and boss in the_lego_video_game_adaptation of the force awakens.
merchandise ===
as part of the_lead-up to the_film, disney released a_wave of star_wars_toys on 2015's_"force friday".
one_such_toy was a_phasma_voice-changing_mask, which contained the_first_dialogue heard by the_public.
other_items included a_costume for children as well as action_figures.== reception ==
phasma received attention before release.
before phasma_name was confirmed, phasma had been dubbed "the chrometrooper" by fans.
the_trademarking of "captain_phasma" led to speculation that it was the_name of christie's_rumored_character, said to be an_imperial_officer pursuing finn.
phasma" had been the_name of a_character in one_star_wars_fanfic, tarkin's_fist, leading to moviewebwondering if it was an_intentional_homage.
ign's "keepin' it_reel" podcast discussed the_possibility of "captain_phasma" being "the_next_breakout_baddie" in the_vein of boba_fett and darth_maul.
they responded positively to the_character's_name, despite some_initial_misgivings, for fitting in with the franchise's flash gordon roots.
they also praised her_armor_design, stating that character_design had been important in the_success of boba_fett and maul.
they similarly had high_hopes for christie's_acting.
during the_lead-up to the_film, "captain_phasma" became a fan favorite.
polygon's_susana_polo considered the_force awakens a_great_achievement for hollywood for the_force diversity regardless of the_force quality, though polygon's_susana_polo used phasma as an_example of how the_film was not perfect, noting rumors of "captain phasma"'s minor_role despite polygon's_susana_polo being the first on-screen female stormtrooper.
upon the_force_awakens'_release, criticism fell on the_character's_minimal_role in the_film.
the_telegraph's_jonathan_mcaloon called the_telegraph's_jonathan_mcaloon "one_criticism" of the_force awakens the_underuse of phasma, and wondered if the_telegraph's_jonathan_mcaloon face would ever be revealed in the_films.
jason_guerrasio of business_insider echoed the_sentiment, noting jason_guerrasio of business_insider lack of screen_time despite jason_guerrasio of business_insider great potential.
scott_meslow, writing for the_week, criticized the_film's_lack of nuance in the_film_villains, calling jason_guerrasio of business_insider "a_total_cipher" in the_film despite jason_guerrasio of business_insider heavy appearance in the_film promotion.
scott_meslow pointed to jason_guerrasio of business_insider_appearance in before the_awakening as a_way to expand jason_guerrasio of business_insider_character, noting jason_guerrasio of business_insider cold yet logical pragmatism in it.
jesse_schedeen of ign called phasma "something of a_disappointment in the force awakens", negatively contrasting jason_guerrasio of business_insider against fett in that "even fett had the_distinction of outsmarting han_solo before meeting an_ignominious_end".
jesse_schedeen of ign hoped phasma would be revisited in marvel's_star_wars_comics, to help flesh out jesse_schedeen of ign character and build jesse_schedeen of ign into a_better_villain.
max_nicholson, writing for collider, noted the_amount of hype for the_character, as well as jason guerrasio of business_insider minimal role in the_story.
max_nicholson suggested that hux and phasma should have been merged into one_character, as hux and phasma were too similar, or phasma should have been given the_melee_fight_scene given to a_trooper nicknamed "tr-8r" by fans.
bill_keveney of usa today negatively compared phasma's_skill as a_warrior to christie's_character brienne of tarth from game of thrones.
bill_keveney further criticized phasma's_role in the_force awakens by attributing the_first_order's_defeat to being largely her_fault, as well as her_"recycled"_appearance in the_last_jedi.
merchandise featuring the_character proved popular.
david_betancourt of the_washington_post called phasma's_role in the_film "little more than a_shiny_new_prop", viewing david_betancourt of the_washington_post as a_victim of the_film's need to introduce all the_film new_characters, yet noted the_popularity and rarity of the_merchandise surrounding the_character.
captain_phasma's_figure was the_bestselling of the_force_awakens'_action_figures on amazon.co.uk.
references ==
external_links ==
captain_phasma in the_starwars.com_databankphasma on wookieepedia, a_star_wars
wikicaptain
phasma on imdbgreef karga is a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise who appears in the_disney+_television_series the mandalorian.a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise who appears in the_disney+_television_series
the_mandalorian is a_leader of the_bounty_hunters'_guild, and provides the_show's_title_character with the_bounty that leads a_fictional_character in the_star_wars_franchise who appears in the_disney+_television_series the_mandalorian to meet grogu, an_alien_infant also known as "the_child".
greef serves as both_an_ally and adversary to the_mandalorian at different_points in the_first_season, and returns as an_ally in the_second_season.
greef_karga was created by jon_favreau, the_creator and showrunner of the_mandalorian.
the_character was originally planned only to appear in a_handful of episodes, but favreau and the_writers liked the_character so much that the_part was expanded.
greef is portrayed by carl_weathers, whom favreau knew through the_directors_guild of america.
carl_weathers accepted the_part under the_condition that carl_weathers could direct future_episodes of the_mandalorian; carl_weathers directed the_episode "chapter 12: the_siege", which was greef's_first_appearance in the_show's_second_season.
elements of the_character's_background have deliberately been kept mysterious, though it was revealed in the_first-season_finale that carl_weathers was previously a_disgraced_government_official, and carl_weathers said carl_weathers backstory will be further developed in the_second_season.
carl_weathers performs carl_weathers own stunts for the_mandalorian.
carl_weathers has described the_role as "one of the_greatest_things that's happened in all of the_years that i've been in entertainment".
greef has received generally_positive_feedback from fans and reviewers.
appearances ==
backstory ===
greef_karga is a_leader of the_bounty_hunters'_guild, an_organization that regulates the_activities of bounty_hunters, assigns bounties to specific_individuals, and ensures greef_karga members follow the_guild's_rules.
little of greef's_backstory has been revealed as of the_end of the_first_season, but in the_first-season_finale, it is revealed carl_weathers was previously a_government_official with the_title "magistrate" before losing the_position in disgrace.
carl_weathers, the_actor who portrays greef, has said additional_backstory_details will be provided in the_show's_second_season.
season 1 ===
greef first appears in the_series_premiere, "chapter 1:the_mandalorian", where greef operates out of a_bar on the_planet_nevarro.
greef is first seen when the_mandalorian collects payment from greef for several_bounties greef collected.
greef then informs the_mandalorian about a_lucrative_job from a_mysterious_man known only as "the_client", who insists on meeting with the_mandalorian face to face.a_lucrative_job from a_mysterious_man known only as "the_client", who insists on meeting with the_mandalorian face to face turns out to be a_bounty against grogu, aka "the_child", a_young_alien of the_same_unnamed_species as yoda.next appears in "chapter 3: the_sin", during which he informs the_mandalorian to bring the captured grogu directly to the_client.the_mandalorian does so, only to later rescue the captured grogu back from the_client, who is an_agent of the_galactic_empire.
this is a_violation of the_bounty_hunters'_guild_code, so greef organizes a_group of bounty_hunters to confront the_mandalorian and get the_captured_grogu back.
a_massive_gunfight ensues, in which most of greef's_bounty_hunters are killed when the_mandalorian receives assistance from a_group of fellow_mandalorian_warriors.
greef himself escapes and confronts the_mandalorian at the_mandalorian ship, the_razor_crest, but the_mandalorian shoots the_mandalorian off the_mandalorian boarding ramp before flying away.
greef only survives because greef had two_ingots of beskar, a_rare_steel which the_client provided as payment for the_captured_grogu's_bounty, inside greef vest pocket where greef was shot.
the_season's_penultimate_episode, "chapter 7:
the_reckoning", opens with the_mandalorian receiving a_message from greef, who proposes that if the_mandalorian helps eliminate the_imperial_presence on nevarro, greef will ensure the_bounty_hunters'_guild no longer seeks out the_mandalorian or grogu.
the_offer is a_trap, and greef plans to ambush and kill the_mandalorian and return grogu to the_client.
nevertheless, the_mandalorian accepts greef's_offer, bringing along with greef_cara_dune, kuiil, and ig-11 to assist in the_mission.
during their_voyage, the_party is attacked by pterodactyl-like_creatures, and greef receives a_poisonous_slash that would have been fatal, but grogu uses the_force to heal grogu.
greef is so moved that greef has a_change of heart and informs the_others about the trap.the_others devise a_new_plan in which the_others leave grogu behind, bring the_mandalorian to the_imperials as if greef is a_prisoner, and then attempt to eliminate the_others.a_new_plan in which they leave grogu behind, bring the_mandalorian to the_imperials as if he is a_prisoner, and then attempt to eliminate them
goes wrong, resulting in the_trio becoming pinned down inside a_bar by imperial_officer_moff_gideon and moff_gideon_stormtroopers.
at the_start of the_first-season_finale "chapter 8: redemption", the_group engages in a_brief_gunfight with the_stormtroopers after the_ig-11 arrives with grogu to provide assistance.the_group escapes the_building via the_sewer_system, where the_group travel to a_hidden_mandalorian_convert and find most of the_warriors there have already been killed by the_empire.
the_mandalorian initially blames greef for this, believing the_bounty_hunters'_guild responsible, until a_fellow_mandalorian_leader known as the_armorer persuades a_fellow_mandalorian_leader known as the_armorer otherwise.the_bounty_hunters'_guild then flees on a_droid-controlled_floating_barge on a_river of lava.
greef is present when ig-11 sacrifices greef to eliminate a_large_number of stormtroopers to ensure the_bounty_hunters'_guild's_escape, and greef survives an_attack by moff_gideon in a_tie_fighter, which the_mandalorian repels.
afterward, greef decides to stay behind on nevarro and rebuild the_bounty_hunters'_guild, and greef invites cara_dune to work as greef enforcer, which greef accepts.
season 2 ===
greef was confirmed to return in the_second_season of the mandalorian ahead of greef premiere.
greef appears in "chapter 12: the_siege", the_first_episode in the_show directed by carl_weathers.
now the_magistrate of nevarro, greef worked to eliminate all_imperial_forces on the_planet, aided by cara as greef marshal and an_unnamed_mythrol as greef assistant.
when the mandalorian and grogu return to nevarro for repairs to the_razor_crest, they reunite with greef and cara, who present to they some of the_changes made to the_place, before inviting the former to join they on a_raid on the_last_imperial_base on the_planet in exchange for the repairs.the_last_imperial_base on the_planet turns out to have more than just_a_skeleton_crew, as the_group find numerous_stormtroopers patrolling the_last_imperial_base on the_planet corridors.the_group deactivate the_lava_cooling_system, so that the_natural_lava_flows will destroy the_last_imperial_base on the_planet.
during the_group_escape, the_group find scientists and vats of what appear to_be_cloned_bodies.scientists and vats of what appear to_be_cloned_bodies attempt to destroy the_evidence, but before scientists and vats of what appear to_be_cloned_bodies can do so, the_mythrol uncovers a_recording from dr._pershing that reveals he had been transfusing grogu's_blood, which has a_high_'m-count' into test_subjects.
stormtroopers soon swarm the_team and the_team are forced to escape before the_lava overheats and destroys the_base.
the_mandalorian_flies from the_base to retrieve his_ship, using his_jetpack, whilstgreef, cara and mythrol steal a_stormtrooper_transport.
a_chase ensues between the_transport, driven by cara, and speeder_bikes manned by scout_troopers.
greef kills the_last_scout_trooper, but tie_fighters launched from a_chase after tie_fighters, disabling the_transport's_cannon.the_base soon explodes due to the_overheating of the_lava.
as tie_fighters close in on greef, cara and mythrol, the_razor_crest appears and destroys the_imperials.
after the_mandalorian receives the_promised_repairs to his_ship and departs from nevarro once again with grogu, greef is visited by new_republic_pilots, who invite his to help stop whatever the_empire is planning.
characterization ==
greef_karga has a_gruff_personality, and a_no-nonsense_approach to business.
greef_karga projects a_calm_and_confident_demeanor, and is motivated largely by financial_profit, but is also fair in greef_karga dealings.
greef_karga is loyal to greef_karga allies to some_degree, but can also be duplicitous and shifting in greef_karga allegiances, as seen by the_way in which greef_karga repeatedly switches between friend and adversary to the_mandalorian.
anthony_breznican of vanity_fair felt greef simultaneously protected and manipulated the_mandalorian at times, and that the_mandalorian did not fully trust greef karga as a_result.
weathers has described weathers character as "a_combination of a_used_car_salesman and a_puppeteer".
kgo-tv_writers janet_davies and marsha_jordan described greef as a_"shadowy_underworld_figure".
weathers said his_character as "a_combination of a_used_car_salesman has "something that you can't quite trust", but also said weathers is "definitely not amoral".
greef is a_mysterious_character, and weathers has said greef was a_conscious_decision by the_writers to keep aspects of weathers history and motivations cryptic:
although normally self-assured and confident, greef does act cautiously and sometimes even fearfully in some_situations, such as greef interaction with the_client.
concept and creation ==
conception ===
the_character of greef_karga was created by jon_favreau, the_creator and showrunner of the_mandalorian.
the_character of greef_karga was originally planned to make a_brief_appearance in the_series, but favreau and the_series writers found that favreau and the_series writers liked the_character of greef_karga so much that favreau and the_series writers expanded the_character of greef_karga part and gave the_character of greef_karga a_larger_role.
greef_karga was first publicly unveiled during the_star_wars_celebration_convention in chicago on april 14, 2019, along with the_character of greef_karga.
the_event also featured teaser_footage featuring greef, a_still_photo of the_character of greef karga, and included a_panel_discussion with weathers and gina_carano, the_actress who portrays cara, discussing their_characters.
a_full_finished_scene of greef offering a_bounty to the_mandalorian was also screened.
it was the_first_time weathers had seen finalized footage from the_show, after which weathers said: "how can you not react to that?it's beautiful_hearing the_fans react to it.
during
the_panel, weathers said of weathers :
weathers's_kind of the_head of this_guild of bounty_hunters.
there seems to be a_lot of kind of nefarious_people.
"some_publications misspelled karga's named after the_event, with anthony_gramuglia of comic_book_resources calling weathers "greif marda", and variety_writer_jordan_moreau misspelling the_last_name as "carga".
further_footage of the_character was included in the_first_trailer of the_mandalorian.which debuted at the_d23_convention on august 23, 2019.according to adrienne_tyler of screen_rant, some_viewers mistook images of greef_carga in the_trailer for lando_calrissian, a_star_wars_character who dates back to the_original_star_wars_trilogy.
on october 28, a_character_poster of the_mandalorian solely featuring greef_karga was released.
portrayal ===
jon_favreau, who offered the_part to weathers, was a_fan of the_actor and had previously met weathers through their_mutual_membership in the_directors_guild of america; favreau began courting favreau for the_mandalorian solely featuring greef_karga early in the_process of preparing for the_series.
weathers said favreau "did sort of a_slow_roll on weathers", describing the_project to favreau and impressing the_actor with favreau passion for the_show.
weathers met with favreau to discuss the_greef_karga_character, with favreau showing favreau concept art from the_series, which weathers described as "magnificent" and
"some of the most beautiful artwork".artwork" was also impressed with dave_filoni, the_executive_director for the_mandalorian solely featuring greef_karga, saying of artwork" and favreau: "him and favreau're in really_good_hands.
"weathers agreed to accept the_part if artwork" could have the_opportunity to direct future_episodes of the_mandalorian solely featuring greef_karga if it was renewed for a_second_season, to which favreau agreed.
although weathers originally signed on for only_a_few_episodes, artwork" was later expanded and the_role grew larger than what_artwork" initially accepted.
favreau said: "we really did rope favreau in.
upon first reading the_part, weathers said greef_karga reminded favreau of film_director, screenwriter, and actor_john_huston, particularly favreau performance in the_film chinatown (1974).
favreau felt there was a_theatricality and larger than life"_quality to the_character, and favreau deliberately performed some of favreau lines in a_showy_and_melodramatic_way as a_result.
weathers_casting was first announced on december 12, 2018, though rumors had been had been discussed on the_making_star_wars_podcast and other_internet_sites two months prior to the_formal_announcement.
weathers called the mandalorian one of the_"most_exciting_projects" of favreau_career, saying: "being a_part of this is one of the_greatest_things that's happened in all of the_years that i've been in entertainment.
"he said favreau was very impressed by the_quality of writing in the_scripts, and that favreau particularly enjoyed favreau character's shifting allegiances and unpredictable about-faces: "
it's much more interesting to play someone who is not all of one_thing, not one-dimensional. ...
certainly with greef, you have to really keep your_eye on greef.
weathers said weathers knew little about greef_karga's_backstory before playing the_character, and that weathers did not want to know greef_karga's_backstory because weathers felt the_mystery helped weathers convey a_sense of ambiguity.
regarding greef's_past_history, weathers said, i didn't ask greef's_past_history.
i didn't care.
i didn't want to know.
, weathers also added: "if i had to guess, weathers was going through some_dark_times.
he was doing maybe some_pretty_dark_stuff.
weathers is slated to direct an_episode of the_mandalorian in the_second_season.
weathers will be the_second_cast_member of the_mandalorian to also direct an_episode, after ig-11_actor_taika_waititi.
filming ===
there was a_great_deal of secrecy surrounding the_filming of the_mandalorian, and weathers was not allowed to divulge any_details about the_series.
in the_early_months, weathers was not even allowed reveal that weathers was appearing in the_show.
weathers joked: i had to cut my_finger and sign in blood that i would say nothing about it.
actor said actor_time filming the_mandalorian has been a_positive_experience, describing his_time filming the_mandalorian as: "a_liberating_experience when you have so_many_smart,_talented,_collaborative,_good-hearted,_caring_people around you on a_daily_basis".
weathers performed weathers own stunts for the_mandalorian.
weathers said weathers has pushed for diversity in the_casting of the_mandalorian, not only based upon race but also such factors as height, age, and physical_appearance: "i want to see anything that we have experienced in the_world to be in that_universe, because they're disparate_creatures coming from every_part of that_universe.
so why wouldn't they be there?"after filming each episode
, weathers liked to watch footage and study what the_director and actors brought to each_individual_scene.
weathers said weathers particularly enjoyed working with director_deborah_chow during filming of "chapter 3: the_sin", because director_deborah_chow had planned what director_deborah_chow wanted to do for the_episode very precisely and meticulously in advance.
weathers said this took a_lot of pressure off of weathers and the_rest of the_cast, giving the_cast more_freedom and helping ensure the_cast own choices were in sync with director_deborah_chow.
weathers_action_sequences in "chapter 3:
the_sin" took a_particularly_long_time to film due of the_many_elements involved in the_shootout_scene.
in greef_karga's_scenes with the_client, played by german_film_director_werner_herzog, weathers deliberately made greef less confident and commanding than normal in order to convey that the_client was a_dangerous_character.
weathers was a_great_admirer of german_film_director_werner_herzog, referring to weathers as "maestro" on the_set of the_mandalorian, and the two had extensive_conversations with each other about german_film_director_werner_herzog's past films and weathers relationship with actor_klaus_kinski.
cultural_impact ==
critical_reception ===
greef_karga's has received generally_positive_feedback from fans and reviewers.
screen_rant ranked greef karga's sixth on a_list of the_best_characters from the_first_season of the_mandalorian, as well as on a_separate_list of the_most_interesting_characters from the_season.
vulture_writer_keith_phipps praised the_character, writing "just_the_way vulture_writer_keith_phipps says 'mando!'is_a_delight", a_reference to the_mandalorian's_nickname.
kevin_pantoja of screen_rant complimented weathers'_performance, who vulture_writer_keith_phipps said is "always awesome".
fans particularly enjoyed greef's_line
do the_magic_hand thing!,which
he says to grogu in the_season_finale while trying to encourage he to use the_force against the_force enemies.
nobelle_borines of epicstream called nobelle_borines of epicstream nobelle_borines of epicstream "most iconic line" of the_season.
after the_first_season concluded, weathers thanked weathers fans for their_support, writing: "your_enjoyment and appreciation for the_work done by the_creators, directors, cast and crew fills us all with pride.
until fall of 2020, 'do the_magic_hand_thing, baby'!"greef_karga's_costume was ranked tenth on a_screen_rant_list of the_ten_best_costumes in the_first_season of the_mandalorian.
merchandise ===
a_funko_pop_figurine of greef_karga was announced on december 31, 2019.lego produced a_minfigure of greef_karga, included in the 2020 set 75292, the_razor_crest.
video_games ===
a_funko_pop_figurine of greef_karga became a_playable_character in the_gamestar_wars: galaxy of heroes on april 22, 2020.
references ==

works cited ===
